SA10canprasu:6_0: nāgārjunāya praṇipatya tasmai tatkārikāṇāṃ vivṛtiṃ kariṣye /
SA10canprasu:7_0: tatra 'na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām';
SA10canprasu:7_1: ityādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ śāstram / tasya kāni saṃbandhābhidhānaprayojanāni iti praśne,
SA10canprasu:7_2: madhyamakāvatāravihitavidhinā advayajñānālaṃkṛtaṃ mahākaruṇopāyapuraḥsaraṃ prathamacittotpādaṃ tathāgatajñānotpattihetumādiṃ kṛtvā yāvadācāryanāgārjunasya viditāviparītaprajñāpāramitānīteḥ karuṇayā parāvabodhārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanam,
SA10canprasu:9_1: tadaviparītasaṃprakāśatvena māhātmyamudbhāvya tatsvabhāvāvyatirekavartine paramagurave tathāgatāya śāstrapraṇayananimittakaṃ praṇāmaṃ kartukāma āha-
SA10canprasu:15_0: avayavārthastu vibhajyate / tatra niruddhirnirodhaḥ / kṣaṇabhaṅgo nirodha ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:15_4: na pṛthagityarthaḥ / nānārtho bhinnārthaḥ / pṛthagityarthaḥ / āgatirāgamaḥ, viprakṛṣṭadeśāvasthitānāṃ saṃnikṛṣṭadeśāgamanam /
SA10canprasu:17_1: samutpūrvaḥ padiḥ prādurbhāvārtha iti samutpādaśabdaḥ prādurbhāve vartate /
SA10canprasu:18_1: itau sādhava ityāḥ / pratirvīpsārthaḥ / ityevaṃ taddhitāntamityaśabdaṃ vyutpādya prati prati ityānāṃ vināśināṃ samutpāda iti varṇayanti /
SA10canprasu:18_3: "yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharma paśyati" ityevamādau viṣaye vīpsārthasya saṃbhavāt samāsasadbhāvācca syājjyāyasī vyutpattiḥ /
SA10canprasu:18_4: iha tu "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam" ityevamādau viṣaye sākṣādaṅgīkṛtārthaviśeṣe cakṣuḥ pratītyeti pratītyaśabda ekacakṣurindriyahetukāyāmapyekavijñānotpattāvabhīṣṭāyāṃ kuto vīpsārthatā? prāptyarthastvanaṅgīkṛtārthaviśeṣe 'pi pratītyaśabde saṃbhavati- prāpya saṃbhavaḥ,
SA10canprasu:18_5: pratītya samutpāda iti / aṅgīkṛtārthaviśeṣe 'pi saṃbhavati- cakṣuḥ pratītya,
SA10canprasu:18_6: cakṣuḥ prāpya, cakṣū rūpaṃ cāpekṣyeti vyākhyānāt /
SA10canprasu:18_7: taddhitānte cetyaśabde "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam" ityatra pratītyaśabdasyāvyayatvābhāvāt samāsāsadbhāvācca vibhaktiśrutau satyāṃ cakṣuḥ pratītya vijñānaṃ rūpāṇi ca iti nipātaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:19_2: eteḥ prāptyarthatvāt, samutpādaśabdasya ca saṃbhavārtha tvāt,
SA10canprasu:19_3: tāṃstān pratyayān pratītya samutpādaḥ prāpya saṃbhava ityeke /
SA10canprasu:19_4: prati prati vināśināmutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityanye"- iti paravyākhyānamanūdya dūṣaṇamabhidhatte,
SA10canprasu:19_6: kiṃ kāraṇam? yo hi prāptyarthaṃ pratītyaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe,
SA10canprasu:19_8: nāpyetiṃ prāptyartham, kiṃ tarhi pratiṃ prāptyartham,
SA10canprasu:20_0: tena idānīṃ prāpya saṃbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityevaṃ vyutpāditena pratītyasamutpādaśabdena yadi niravaśeṣasaṃbhavipadārthaparāmarśo vivakṣitaḥ,
SA10canprasu:20_1: tadā tāṃ tāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya saṃbhava pratītya samutpāda iti vīpsāsaṃbandhaḥ kriyate /
SA10canprasu:20_2: atha viśeṣaparāmarśaḥ, tadā cakṣuḥ prāpya rūpāṇi ceti na vīpsāyāḥ saṃbandha iti /
SA10canprasu:21_0: etadvā ayuktam / kiṃ ca / ayuktametat "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam" iti,
SA10canprasu:21_2: tadapi nopapadyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? kathamanenaiva tatprāpteḥ saṃbhava iti yuktyanupādānena pratijñāmātratvāt /
SA10canprasu:21_5: etadapi na yuktam, 'prāptaphalo 'yaṃ bhikṣuḥ'; ityatrāpi prāptyabhyupagamāt /
SA10canprasu:24_1: asmin sati idaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate, iti idaṃpratyayatārthaḥ pratītyasamutpādārtha iti",
SA10canprasu:28_0: asminsatīdaṃ bhavati hrasve dīrghaṃ yathā sati /
SA10canprasu:29_1: hrasvaṃ pratītya, hrasvaṃ prāpya, hrasvamapekṣya dīrghaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10canprasu:29_2: tataśca yadeva dūṣyate tadevābhyupagamyate iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:30_1: tadevaṃ hetupratyayāpekṣaṃ bhāvānāmutpādaṃ paridīpayatā bhagavatā ahetvekahetuviṣamahetusaṃbhūtatvaṃ svaparobhayakṛtatvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ niṣiddhaṃ bhavati,
SA10canprasu:30_2: tanniṣedhācca sāṃvṛtānāṃ padārthānāṃ yathāvasthitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamudbhāvitaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:30_3: sa evedānīṃ sāṃvṛtaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvād āryajñānāpekṣayā nāsminnirodho vidyate yāvannāsminnirgamo vidyate ityanirodhādibhiraṣṭābhirviśe ṣaṇairviśiṣyate /
SA10canprasu:30_4: yathā ca nirodhādayo na santi pratītyasamutpādasya tathā sakalaśāstreṇa pratipādayiṣyati /
SA10canprasu:31_2: prapañcānāmupaśamo 'sminniti sa eva pratītyasamutpādaḥ prapaḥcopaśama ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:31_4: yathābhihitaviśeṣaṇasya pratītyasamutpādasya deśanākriyayā īpsitatamatvāt karmaṇā nirdeśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:33_0: yathopavarṇitapratītyasamutpādāvagamācca tathāgatasyaivaikasyāviparītārthavāditvaṃ paśyan sarvaparapravādāṃśca bālapralāpānivāvetya atīva prasādānugata ācāryo bhūyo bhagavantaṃ viśeṣayati- vadatāṃ varamiti /
SA10canprasu:34_0: atra ca nirodhasya pūrvaṃ prativedhaḥ utpādanirodhayoḥ paurvāparyāvasthāyāḥ siddhayabhāvaṃ dyotayitum /
SA10canprasu:36_0: iti / tasmānnāyaṃ niyamo yat pūrvamutpādena bhavitavyaṃ paścānnirodheneti //
SA10canprasu:37_0: idānīmanirodhādiviśiṣṭapratītyasamutpādapratipipādayiṣayā utpādapratiṣedhena nirodhādi pratiṣedhasaukarya manyamāna ācāryaḥ prathamamevotpādaprativedhamārabhate /
SA10canprasu:37_1: utpādo hi paraiḥ parikalpyamānaḥ svato vā parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:37_2: parataḥ, ubhayataḥ, ahetuto vā parikalpyeta / sarvathā ca nopapadyata iti niścityāha-
SA10canprasu:38_0: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA10canprasu:38_1: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana // 3 //
SA10canprasu:39_2: kvacanaśabda ādhāravacanaḥ kvacicchabdaparyāyaḥ kecanaśabda ādheyavacanaḥ kecicchabdaparyāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:39_3: tataścaivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ- naiva svata utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ,
SA10canprasu:40_0: nanu ca- naiva svata utpannā ityavadhāryamāṇe parata utpannā ityaniṣṭaṃ prāpnoti /
SA10canprasu:40_3: yayā copapattyā svata utpādo na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:41_0: tasmāddhi tasya bhavane na guṇo 'sti kaścij-
SA10canprasu:41_1: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam /
SA10canprasu:43_1: tadutpādavaiyarthyāt, atiprasaṅgadoṣācca / na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ padārthānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamasti /
SA10canprasu:44_2: prasaṅga vākyatvācca prakṛtārthaviparyayeṇa viparītārthasādhyataddharmavyaktau parasmādutpannābhāvājanmasāphalyāt janmaniro(bo?)dhācceti kṛtāntavirodhaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:45_2: tadayuktam / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmātparaḥ svata utpattimabhyupagacchan,
SA10canprasu:45_3: pṛcchayate- svata iti hetutvena tadeva cotpadyate iti? na ca vidyamānasya punarutpattau prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ,
SA10canprasu:45_4: anavasthāṃ ca paśyāmaḥ / na ca tvayā utpannasya punarutpāda iṣyate 'navasthā cāpyaniṣṭeti /
SA10canprasu:45_6: kimiti codite paronābhyupaiti yato hetudṛṣṭāntopādānasāphalyaṃ syāt? atha svābhyupagamavirodhacodanayāpi paro na nivartate,
SA10canprasu:45_9: tasmātsarvathā priyānumānatāmevātmanaḥ ācāryaḥ prakaṭayati asthāne 'pyanumānaṃ praveśayan /
SA10canprasu:45_10: na ca mādhyamikasya sataḥ svatantramanumānaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ pakṣāntarābhyupagamābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:48_0: yadi kācana pratijñā syānme tata eva me bhaveddoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:48_1: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ //
SA10canprasu:49_1: tadā kutaḥ "nādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni" iti svatantrā pratijñā yasyāṃ sāṃkhyāḥ pratyavasthāpyante /
SA10canprasu:49_2: ko 'rya pratijñārthaḥ kiṃ kāryātmakatvātsvata uta kāraṇātmakatvāditi /
SA10canprasu:49_6: kuto 'smākaṃ vidyamānatvāditi heturyasya siddhasādhanaṃ viruddhārthatā vā syāt,
SA10canprasu:49_7: yasya siddhasādhanasya yasyāśca viruddhārthatāyāḥ parihārārthaṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:50_0: athāpi syāt- mādhyamikānāṃ pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntānāmasiddheḥ svatantrānumānānabhidhāyitvāt svata utpattipratiṣedhapratijñātārthasādhanaṃ mā bhūdubhayasiddhena vānumānena parapratijñānirākaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:50_1: parapratijñāyāstu svata evānumānavirodhacodanayā svata eva pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntadoṣarahitaiḥ pakṣādibhirbhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:50_2: tataśca tadanabhidhānāt taddoṣāparihārācca sa eva doṣa iti /
SA10canprasu:50_3: ucyate / naitadevam / kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmād yo hi yamarthaṃ pratijānīte,
SA10canprasu:50_4: tena svaniścayavadanyeṣāṃ niścayotpādanecchayā yayā upapattyā asāvartho 'dhigataḥ saivopapattiḥ parasmai upadeṣṭavyā /
SA10canprasu:50_7: hetudṛṣṭāntāsaṃbhavāt pratijñānusāratayaiva kevalaṃ svapratijñātārthasādhanamupādatta iti nirupapattikapakṣābhyupagamāt svātmānamevāyaṃ kevalaṃ visaṃvādayan na śaknoti pareṣāṃ niścayamādhātumiti /
SA10canprasu:50_8: idamevāsya spaṣṭataraṃ dūṣaṇaṃ yaduta svapratijñātārthasādhanāsāmarthyamiti kimatrānumānabādhodbhāvanayā prayojanam? athāpyavaśyaṃ svato 'numānavirodhadoṣa udbhāvanīyaḥ,
SA10canprasu:50_10: kathamiti cet, na svata utpadyante bhāvāḥ, tadutpādavaiyarthyāditi vacanāt,
SA10canprasu:50_11: atra hi tadityanena svātmanā vidyamānasya parāmarśaḥ /
SA10canprasu:50_12: kasmāditi cet, tathā hi tasya saṃgraheṇoktavākyasyaitadvivaraṇavākyam,
SA10canprasu:50_13: na hi svātmanā vidyamānānāṃ punarutpāde prayojanamiti /
SA10canprasu:50_14: anena ca vākyena sādhyasādhanadharmānugatasya paraprasiddhasya sādharmyadṛṣṭāntasyopādānam /
SA10canprasu:50_19: tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ / tasmātkṛtakatvādanitya iti kṛtakatvamatra upanayābhivyakto hetuḥ /
SA10canprasu:50_22: iha hi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ puro 'vasthitaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ punarutpādānapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:50_23: tathā ca mṛtpiṇḍādyavasthāyāmapi yadi svātmanā vidyamānaṃ ghaṭādikamiti manyase,
SA10canprasu:50_24: tadāpi tasya svātmanā vidyamānasya nāstyutpāda iti /
SA10canprasu:50_25: evaṃ svātmanā vidyamānatvena upanayābhivyaktena punarutpādapratiṣedhāvyabhicāriṇā hetunā svata eva sāṃkhyasyānumānavirodhodbhāvanamanuṣṭhitameveti /
SA10canprasu:51_0: na ca kevalaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntānabhidhānaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:51_2: kathaṃ kṛtvā? sāṃkhyā hi naiva abhivyaktarūpasya puro 'vasthitasya ghaṭasya punarabhivyaktimicchanti /
SA10canprasu:51_4: siddharūpatvāt / anabhivyaktarūpasya ca śaktirūpāpannasya utpattipratiṣedhaviśiṣṭasādhyatvāt kutaḥ siddhasādhanapakṣadoṣāśaṅkā,
SA10canprasu:53_0: athavā / ayamanyaḥ prayogamārgaḥ- puruṣavyatiriktāḥ padārthāḥ svata utpattivādinaḥ /
SA10canprasu:54_0: yadyapi ca abhivyaktivādina utpādapratiṣedho na bādhakaḥ,
SA10canprasu:54_1: tathāpi abhivyaktāvutpādaśabdaṃ nipātya pūrvaṃ paścācca anupalabdhyupalabdhisādharmyeṇa utpādaśabdenābhivyakterevābhidhānādayaṃ pratiṣedho na abādhakaḥ /
SA10canprasu:55_0: kathaṃ punarayaṃ yathoktārthābhidhānaṃ vinā vyastavicāro labhyata iti cet,
SA10canprasu:55_1: taducyate / atha vākyāni kṛtāni, tāni mahārthatvādyathoditamarthaṃ saṃgṛhya pravṛttāni /
SA10canprasu:55_2: tāni ca vyākhyāyamānāni yathoktamarthātmānaṃ prasūyanta iti nātra kiṃcidanupāttaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
SA10canprasu:56_2: parasya ca yāvadbahavo doṣāḥ prasaṅgaviparītāpattyā āpadyante,
SA10canprasu:56_4: kuto nu khalu aviparītācāryanāgārjunamatānusāriṇaḥ ācāryabuddhapālitasya sāvakāśavacanābhidhāyitvam,
SA10canprasu:56_5: yato 'sya paro 'vakāśaṃ labheta? niḥsvabhāvabhāvavādinā sasvabhāvabhāvavādinaḥ prasaṅge āpa(pā?)dyamāne kutaḥ prasaṅgaviparītārthaprasaṅgitā? na hi śabdāḥ dāṇḍapāśikā iva vaktāramasvatantrayanti,
SA10canprasu:56_8: tathā ca ācāryo bhūyasā prasaṅgāpattimukhenaiva parapakṣaṃ nirākaroti sma /
SA10canprasu:57_5: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10canprasu:58_0: ityādinā / atha arthavākyatvādācāryavākyānāṃ mahārthatve sati anekaprayoniṣpattihetutvaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:59_2: etadapi nāsti, vigrahavyāvartanyā vṛttiṃ kurvatāpyācāryeṇa prayogavākyānabhidhānāt /
SA10canprasu:60_0: api ca / ātmanastarkaśāstrātikauśalamātramāviścikīrṣayā aṅgīkṛtamadhyamakadarśanasyāpi yatsvatantraprayogavākyābhidhānaṃ tadatitarāmanekadoṣasamudāyāspadamasya tārkikasyopalakṣyate /
SA10canprasu:60_1: kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra yattāvadevamuktam- atra prayogavākyaṃ bhavati- na paramārthataḥ ādhyātmikānyāyatanāni svata utpannāni,
SA10canprasu:60_2: vidyamānatvāt, caitanyavaditi / kimartha punaratra paramārthata iti viśeṣaṇamupādīyate? lokasaṃvṛtyābhyupagatasya utpādasya apratiṣidhyamānatvāt,
SA10canprasu:61_0: "sa cāyaṃ bījahetuko 'ṅkura utpadyamāno na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto nāpyahetusamutpanno niśvarakālāṇuprakṛtisvabhāvasaṃbhūtaḥ" iti /
SA10canprasu:63_0: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:63_1: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanucchedaaśāśvatadharmatā //
SA10canprasu:65_0: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10canprasu:67_3: satyadvayāviparītadarśanaparibhraṣṭā eva hi tīrthikā yāvadubhayathāpi niṣidhyante tāvad guṇa eva saṃbhāvyata iti /
SA10canprasu:68_2: loko hi svataḥ parata ityevamādikaṃ vicāramanavatārya kāraṇātkāryamutpadyate ityetāvanmātraṃ pratipannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:69_0: api ca / yadi saṃvṛtyā utpattipratiṣedhanirācikīrṣuṇā viśeṣaṇametadupādīyate,
SA10canprasu:69_5: paramārthata ityetattarhi kasya viśeṣaṇam? sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthata utpattipratiṣedhād utpattipratiṣedhaviśeṣaṇe paramārthagrahaṇamiti cet,
SA10canprasu:69_6: evaṃ tarhi evameva vaktavyaṃ syāt- sāṃvṛtānāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ paramārthato nāstyutpattiriti /
SA10canprasu:69_8: prajñaptisatāmanabhyupagamāt parato 'siddhādhāraḥ pakṣadoṣaḥ syāditi na yuktametat /
SA10canprasu:70_0: atha syāt- yathā anityaḥ śabda iti dharmadharmisāmānyameva gṛhyate na viśeṣaḥ,
SA10canprasu:70_2: tathā hi- yadi cāturmahābhautikaḥ śabdo gṛhyate,
SA10canprasu:70_3: sa parasyāsiddhaḥ / athākāśaguṇo gṛhyate, sa bauddhasya svato 'siddhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:70_4: tathā vaiśeṣikasya śabdānityatāṃ pratijānānasya yadi kāryaḥ śabdo gṛhyate,
SA10canprasu:70_5: sa parato 'siddhaḥ / atha vyaṅgayaḥ, sa svato 'siddhaḥ / evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vināśo 'pi yadi sahetukaḥ,
SA10canprasu:70_7: atha nirhetukaḥ, sa parasyāsiddha iti / tasmād yathātra dharmadharmisāmānyamātrameva gṛhyate,
SA10canprasu:70_13: taimirikeṇeva keśādi, tadā kutaḥ sadbhūtapadārthaleśasyāpyupalabdhiḥ? yadā ca aviparyāsādabhūtaṃ nādhyāropitaṃ vitaimirikeṇeva keśādi,

SA10canprasu:135_7: sa tena saṃjñāviparyāsena kālagataḥ samāno bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti /
SA10canprasu:136_0: tadyathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitrajñātisālohitā evaṃ vadanti- mā bhaiḥ,
SA10canprasu:136_1: mā bhaiḥ, bho puruṣa / supto hi tvam / na tvamito gṛhyat kutaścinnirgataḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:136_2: evameva buddhā bhagavantaścaturviparyāsaviparyastānāṃ sattvānāmevaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti- nātra strī na puruṣo na sattvo na jīvo na puruṣo na pudgalaḥ /
SA10canprasu:136_3: vitathā ime sarvadharmāḥ / asanta ime sarvadharmāḥ / viṭhapitā ime sarvadharmāḥ / māyopamā ime sarvadharmāḥ / svapnopamā ime sarvadharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:136_6: iti vistaraḥ / te imāṃ tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā vigatarāgān sarvadharmān paśyanti /
SA10canprasu:136_9: te kālagatāḥ samānā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti /
SA10canprasu:138_0: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike /
SA10canprasu:138_1: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam //
SA10canprasu:138_2: na ca kāraku kāraṇa santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ /
SA10canprasu:138_3: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ //
SA10canprasu:138_5: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena //
SA10canprasu:138_6: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ /
SA10canprasu:138_7: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ //
SA10canprasu:139_0: tadevamete 'svabhāvā bhāvāḥ svaviparyāsaviṭhapitā bālānāṃ saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam /
SA10canprasu:140_0: yathā ca mṛṣāsvabhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānahetutvaṃ tathā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyam /
SA10canprasu:141_0: atrāha- yadi svataḥ parataḥ ubhayato 'hetutaśca nāsti bhāvānāmutpādaḥ,
SA10canprasu:141_1: tatra kathamavidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:142_0: kiṃ saṃvṛtervyavasthānaṃ vaktavyam? idaṃpratyayatāmātreṇa saṃvṛteḥ siddhirabhyupagamyate /
SA10canprasu:142_2: tasya cāyuktatvāt / idaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagame hi sati hetuphalayoranyonyāpekṣatvānnāsti svābhāvikī siddhiriti nāsti sasvabhāvavādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:145_0: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10canprasu:148_0: atra kecitparicodayanti- anutpannā bhāvā iti kimayaṃ pramāṇajo niścaya utāpramāṇajaḥ? tatra yadi pramāṇaja iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:148_1: tadedaṃ vaktavyam- kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi,
SA10canprasu:148_2: kiṃ svata utpannāni kiṃ parata ubhayato 'hetuto veti /
SA10canprasu:148_4: anadhigato hyartho na vinā pramāṇairadhigantuṃ śakyata iti pramāṇābhāvādarthādhigamābhāve sati kuto 'yaṃ samyagniścaya iti na yuktametadaniṣpannā bhāvā iti /
SA10canprasu:148_5: yato vāyaṃ niścayo bhavato 'nutpannā bhāvā iti bhaviṣyati,
SA10canprasu:148_7: yathā cāyaṃ te niścayaḥ- anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti,
SA10canprasu:148_9: atha te nāsti niścayo 'nutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti,
SA10canprasu:149_2: na tvasti / kiṃ kāraṇam? ihāniścayasaṃbhave sati syāttatpratipakṣastadapekṣo niścayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:149_7: tadā kasya prasiddhayarthaṃ pramāṇāni parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ? kuto vaiṣāṃ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo vā bhaviṣyati- svataḥ parata ubhayato 'hetuto vā samutpattiriti sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:150_1: kathaṃ punaridaṃ niścitarūpaṃ vākyamupalabhyate bhavatām- na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetuto bhāvā bhavantīti? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:150_3: nāryāṇām / kiṃ khalu āryāṇāmupapattirnāsti? kenaitaduktamasti vā nāsti veti /
SA10canprasu:151_1: kena khalvidānīṃ paramārthaṃ lokaṃ bodhayiṣyanti? na khalvāryā lokasaṃvyavahāreṇopapattiṃ varṇayanti,
SA10canprasu:151_2: kiṃ tu lokata eva yā prasiddhopapattiḥ,
SA10canprasu:151_4: yathaiva hi vidyamānāmapi śarīrāśucitāṃ viparyāsānugatā rāgiṇo nopalabhante,
SA10canprasu:151_6: teṣāṃ vairāgyārthaṃ tathāgatanirmito [Pp_20] devo vā śubhasaṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāyadoṣānupavarṇayet- santyasmin kāye keśā ityādinā /
SA10canprasu:151_7: te ca tasyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā vimuktā vairāgyamāsādayeyuḥ /
SA10canprasu:151_8: evamihāpyāryaiḥ sarvathāpyanupalabhyamānātmakaṃ bhāvānāmavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītaṃ svabhāvamadhyāropya kvacicca kaṃcidviśeṣamatitarāṃ parikliśyanti pṛthagjanāḥ /
SA10canprasu:151_10: yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛdādibhya utpāda ityabhyupetam,
SA10canprasu:151_12: yathā ca parabhūtebhyo jvālāṅgārādibhyo 'ṅkurasyotpattirnāsti iti abhyupetam,
SA10canprasu:152_1: etadapyuktam / yasmādanubhava eṣa mṛṣā, anubhavatvāt, taimirikadvicandrādyanubhavavaditi /
SA10canprasu:152_6: gantṛgantavyagamanādiko 'pi niravaśeṣo viśeṣo nāsti pratītyasamutpādasyeti pratipādanārtham /
SA10canprasu:153_0: atha syāt- eṣa eva pramāṇapremeyavyavahāro laukiko 'smābhiḥ śāstreṇānuvarṇita iti,
SA10canprasu:153_4: etadapyayuktam / yadi hi kutārkikairviparītalakṣaṇapraṇayanātkṛtaṃ lakṣyavaiparītyaṃ lokasya syāt,
SA10canprasu:153_6: na caitadevam / iti vyartha evārya prayatna iti /
SA10canprasu:154_1: tāni pramāṇāni kena paricchidyanta ityādinā vigrahavyāvartanyāṃ vihito doṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:155_0: kiṃ ca / yadi svasāmānyalakṣaṇadvayānurodhena pramāṇadvayamuktaṃ yasya tallakṣaṇadvayam,
SA10canprasu:155_2: tadā tadaparaṃ prameyamastīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam? atha nāsti lakṣyam,
SA10canprasu:155_3: tadā lakṣaṇamapi nirāśrayaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam? vakṣyati hi-
SA10canprasu:157_2: iti karmaṇi lyuṭaṃ kṛtvā lakṣyate taditi lakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:157_4: tasya karaṇasya karmaṇo 'rthāntaratvāt sa eva doṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:158_0: atha syāt- jñānasya karaṇatvāttasya ca svalakṣaṇāntarbhāvādayamadoṣa iti,
SA10canprasu:158_2: tadyathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vedanāyā viṣayānubhavo vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ /
SA10canprasu:158_3: tena hi tallakṣyata iti kṛtvā prasiddhānugatāṃ ca [Pp_21] vyutpattimavadhūya karmasādhanamabhyupagacchati /
SA10canprasu:158_4: vijñānasya ca karaṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyamānenetyuktaṃ bhavati svalakṣaṇasyaiva karmatā svalakṣaṇāntarasya karaṇabhāvaśceti /
SA10canprasu:158_6: tasya vyatiriktena karmaṇā bhavitavyamiti sa eva doṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:159_0: atha syāt- yatpṛthivyādigataṃ kāṭhinyādikaṃ vijñānagamyaṃ tattasya karmāstyeva,
SA10canprasu:159_2: evaṃ tarhi vijñānasvalakṣaṇasya karmatvābhāvātprameyatvaṃ na syāt,
SA10canprasu:159_4: tataśca dvividhaṃ prameyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca ityetadviśeṣya vaktavyam- kiṃcitsvalakṣaṇaṃ prameyaṃ yallakṣyata ityevaṃ vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:159_6: atha tadapi karmasādhanaṃ tadā tasyānyena karaṇena bhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:160_1: tatastayā svasaṃvityā grahaṇātkarmatāyā satyāmastyeva prameyāntarbhāva iti,
SA10canprasu:160_2: ucyate / vistareṇa madhyamakāvatāre svasaṃvittiniṣedhāt svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇāntareṇa lakṣyate,
SA10canprasu:160_4: api ca / tadapi nāma jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇavyatirekeṇāsiddherasaṃbhavāllakṣyābhāve nirāśrayalakṣaṇapravṛttyasaṃbhavāt sarvathā nāstīti kutaḥ svasaṃvittiḥ? tathā coktamāryaratnacūḍaparipṛcchāyām-
SA10canprasu:161_3: atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam? yadi tāvadanyadālambanamanyaccittam,
SA10canprasu:161_4: tadā dvicittatā bhaviṣyati / atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam,
SA10canprasu:161_5: tatkathaṃ cittena cittaṃ samanupaśyati? na ca cittaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA10canprasu:161_6: tadyathāpi nāma tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā na śakyate chettum,
SA10canprasu:161_8: evameva na tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ śakyaṃ draṣṭum /
SA10canprasu:161_9: tasyaivaṃ yoniśaḥ prayuktasya yā cittasyānavasthānatā anucchedāśāśvatatā na kūṭasthatā nāhetukī na pratyayaviruddhā na tato nānyato na saiva nānyā /
SA10canprasu:161_10: tāṃ cittadhārāṃ cittalatāṃ cittadharmatāṃ cittānavasthitatāṃ cittāpracāratāṃ cittādṛśyatāṃ cittasvalakṣaṇatāṃ tathā jānāti tathā paśyati yathā tathatāṃ na ca nirodhayati /
SA10canprasu:161_11: tāṃ ca cittavivekatāṃ tathā prajānāti tathā paśyati /
SA10canprasu:162_0: tadevaṃ nāsti svasaṃvittiḥ / tadabhāvāt kiṃ kena lakṣyate?
SA10canprasu:163_0: kiṃ ca / bhedena vā tallakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyātsyādabhedena vā? tatra yadi tāvad bhedena,
SA10canprasu:165_0: na ca vinā tattvānyatvena lakṣyalakṣaṇasiddhau anyā gatirasti / tathā ca vakṣyati-
SA10canprasu:166_1: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // iti //
SA10canprasu:167_1: naitadevam / avācyatā hi nāma parasparavibhāgaparijñānābhāve sati bhavati /
SA10canprasu:167_3: tatra idaṃ lakṣaṇam, idaṃ lakṣyam, iti viśeṣataḥ paricchedāsaṃbhave sati dvayorapyabhāva eveti /
SA10canprasu:168_0: api ca / yadi jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ viṣayasya paricchede,
SA10canprasu:168_1: kaḥ kartā? na ca kartāramantareṇāsti karaṇādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ chidikriyāyāmiva /
SA10canprasu:168_3: tadapi na yuktam, yasmādarthamātradarśanaṃ cittasya vyāpāraḥ,
SA10canprasu:170_0: ityabhyupagamāt / ekasyāṃ hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ guṇakriyānirvṛttidvāreṇāṅgībhāvopagamāt /
SA10canprasu:170_1: karaṇādīnāṃ karaṇāditvam / na ceha jñānavijñānayorekā pradhānakriyā,
SA10canprasu:170_3: jñānasya tu arthaviśeṣapariccheda iti nāsti jñānasya karaṇatvaṃ nāpi cittasya kartṛtvam /
SA10canprasu:171_0: atha syāt- anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityāgamāt kartuḥ sarvathābhāvāt kartāramantareṇāpi vidyata eva kriyādivyavahāra iti,
SA10canprasu:172_3: naitadevam / atulyatvāt / śarīraśiraḥśabdayohi buddhayādipāṇyādivatsahabhāvipadārthāntarasāpekṣatāpravṛttau śarīraśiraḥ śabdamātrālambano buddhayupajananaḥ sahacāripadārthāntarasākāṅkṣa eva vartate,
SA10canprasu:172_4: kasya śarīram, kasya śira iti / itaro 'pi viśeṣaṇāntaraḥ saṃbandhanirācikīrṣayā /
SA10canprasu:172_6: iha tu kāṭhinyādivyatiriktapṛthivyādyasaṃbhave sati na yukto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:172_8: naitadevam / na hi tīrthikaparikalpitā yuktividhurāḥ padārthāḥ svasamaye 'bhyupagantuṃ nyāyyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:172_10: api ca / pudgalādiprajñaptivat saśarīropādānasya śilāputrakasyopādāturlaukikavyavahārāṅgabhūtasya viśeṣaṇasyāvicāraprasiddhasya sadbhāvāt,
SA10canprasu:172_13: naitadevam / laukike vyavahāre itthaṃ vicārāpravṛtteravicārataśca laukikapadārthānāmastitvāt /
SA10canprasu:172_14: yathaiva hi rūpādivyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:173_0: evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ yadyapi kāṭhinyādivyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:173_2: tathāpi saṃvṛtireveti parasparāpekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhiṃ vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryāḥ /
SA10canprasu:173_7: kiṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpavedanādīnāmapi nāsti saṃbhava iti teṣāmapi saṃvṛtyā śilāputrakādivannāstitvamāstheyaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:174_0: atha syāt- kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā? naiva hi vayaṃ sarvapramāṇaprameyavyavahāraṃ satyamityācakṣmahe,
SA10canprasu:174_1: kiṃ tu lokaprasiddhireṣā amunā nyāyena vyavasthāpyata iti /
SA10canprasu:174_2: ucyate / vayamapyevaṃ brūmaḥ- kimanayā sūkṣmekṣikayā laukikavyavahāre 'vatārika(ta?)yā? tiṣṭhatu tāvadeṣā viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣāvāhakakuśalamūlopacayahetuḥ,
SA10canprasu:174_3: yāvanna tattvādhigama iti / bhavāṃstu etāṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyavibhāgadurvidagdhabuddhitayā kvacidupapattimavatārya anyāyato nāśayati /
SA10canprasu:174_4: so 'haṃ saṃvṛtisatyavyavasthāvaicakṣaṇyāllaukika eva pakṣe sthitvā saṃvṛtyekadeśanirākaraṇopakṣiptopapattyantaramupapattyantareṇa vinivartayan lokavṛddha iva lokacārātparibhraśyamānaṃ bhavantameva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim /
SA10canprasu:174_7: tataśca sa eva doṣaḥ / atha paramārthaḥ, tadā lakṣyābhāvāllakṣaṇadvayamapi nāstīti kutaḥ pramāṇadvayam?
SA10canprasu:175_2: śabdārthaṃ kriyākaraṇādikaṃ ca necchatīti aho vata icchāmātrapratibaddhapravṛttito (vṛttiḥ?) bhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:176_0: yadā caivaṃ prameyadvayamavyavasthitaṃ tadā svasāmānyalakṣaṇāviṣayatvena āgamādīnāṃ pramāṇāntaratvam /
SA10canprasu:176_1: kiṃ ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityevamādikasya laukikavyavahārasyāsaṃgrahādanāryavyavahārābhyupagamācca avyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti na yuktametat /
SA10canprasu:177_2: tataśca yathaiva kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ sukha utpāda iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:177_3: evaṃ pratyakṣanīlādinimittako 'pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣa iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:177_7: sa sukha iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddha evetyevaṃviṣaye yukta upacāraḥ /
SA10canprasu:177_8: ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityatra tu- na hi ghaṭo nāma kaścidyo 'pratyakṣaḥ pṛthagupalabdho yasyopacārātpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:177_13: api ca / lokavyavahārāṅgabhūto ghaṭo yadi nīlādivyatirikto nāstīti kṛtvā tasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:177_14: nanvevaṃ sati pṛthivyādivyatirekeṇa nīlādikamapi nāstīti nīlāderasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kalpyatām /
SA10canprasu:178_1: vāyvādivyatirekeṇa tathā rūpaṃ na vidyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:181_0: lokasaṃvṛtyā tvabhyupagantavyameva pratyakṣatvaṃ ghaṭādīnām / yathoktaṃ śatake-
SA10canprasu:182_0: sarva eva ghaṭo 'dṛṣṭo rūpe dṛṣṭe hi jāyate /
SA10canprasu:183_1: pratigatamakṣamasminniti kṛtvā ghaṭanīlādīnāmaparokṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:183_2: tatparicchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇatuṣāgnivat pratyakṣakāraṇatvāt pratyakṣatvaṃ vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:183_3: yastu akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaśabdaṃ vyutpādayati,
SA10canprasu:183_4: tasya jñānasyendriyāviṣayatvād viṣayaviṣayatvācca na yuktā vyutpattiḥ /
SA10canprasu:184_0: atha syāt- yathā ubhayādhīnāyāmapi vijñānapravṛtau āśrayasya paṭumandatānuvidhānād vijñānānāṃ tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayeṇaivavyapadeśo bhavati cakṣurvijñānamiti,
SA10canprasu:184_2: tathāpi akṣamakṣamāśritya vartamānaṃ vijñānamāśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣamiti bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:184_3: dṛṣṭo hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśo bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
SA10canprasu:184_4: naitatpūrveṇa tulyam / tatra hi viṣayeṇa [Pp_25] vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpavijñānamityevamādinā vijñānaṣaṭkasya bhedo nopadarśitaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:184_6: tathā hi nīlādivijñānaṣaṭke vijñānamityukte sākāṅkṣa eva pratyayājjāyate kimetadrūpīndriyajaṃ vijñānamāhosvinmānasamiti /
SA10canprasu:184_7: āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaviṣaye pravṛttisaṃbhave 'pi parasparabhedaḥ siddho bhavati /
SA10canprasu:184_8: iha tu pramāṇalakṣaṇavivakṣayā kalpanāpoḍhamātrasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagame sati vikalpādeva tadviśeṣatvābhimatatvādasādhāraṇakāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcit prayojanamupalakṣyate /
SA10canprasu:184_9: prameyaparatantrāyāṃ ca pramāṇasaṃkhyāpravṛttau prameyākārānukāritāmātratayā ca samāsāditātmabhāvasattākayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanānnendriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcidupakarotīti sarvathā viṣayeṇaiva vyapadeśo nyāyyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:185_0: loke pratyakṣaśabdasya prasiddhatvādvivakṣite 'rthe pratyarthaśabdasyāprasiddhatvādāśrayeṇaiva vyutpattirāśrīyata iti cet,
SA10canprasu:185_2: sa tu yathā loke, tathā asmābhirucyata eva / yathāsthitalaukikapadārthatiraskāreṇa tu tadvayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddhaśabdatiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:185_4: ekasya ca cakṣurvijñānasya ekendriyakṣaṇāśrayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ na syād vīpsārthābhāvāt,
SA10canprasu:185_5: ekaikasya ca pratyakṣatvābhāve bahūnāmapi na syāt /
SA10canprasu:186_2: laukikasya ca pramāṇaprameyavyavahārasya vyākhyātumiṣṭatvād vyarthaiva pratyakṣapramāṇakalpanā saṃjāyate /
SA10canprasu:186_3: cakṣurvijñānasāmaṅgī nīlaṃ jānāti no tu nīlamiti cāgamasya pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānārthasyāprastutatvāt,
SA10canprasu:186_4: pañcānāmindriyavijñānānāṃ jaḍatvapratipādakatvācca nāgamādapi kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva vijñānasya pratyakṣatvamiti na yuktametat /
SA10canprasu:186_5: tasmālloke yadi lakṣyaṃ yadi vā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
SA10canprasu:186_7: ataḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadviṣayeṇa jñānena saha /
SA10canprasu:187_2: sādṛśyādananubhūtārthadhigama upamānaṃ gauriva gavaya iti yathā //
SA10canprasu:188_0: tāni ca parasparāpekṣayā sidhyanti- satsu pramāṇeṣu prameyārthāḥ,
SA10canprasu:188_2: no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇaprameyayoḥ siddhiriti /
SA10canprasu:188_4: prastutameva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ / laukika eva darśane sthitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā /
SA10canprasu:189_0: atrāhuḥ svayūthyāḥ- yadidamuktaṃ na svata utpadyante bhāvā iti,
SA10canprasu:189_1: tadyuktam, svata utpattivaiyarthyāt / yaccoktaṃ na dvābhyāmiti, tadapi yuktam, ekāṃśavaikalyāt / ahetupakṣastu [Pp_26] ekāntanikṛṣṭa iti tatpratiṣedho 'pi yuktaḥ/
SA10canprasu:189_3: tadayuktam yasmātparabhūtā eva bhagavatā bhāvānāmutpādakā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA10canprasu:191_2: sa tasya hetu pratyayaḥ / utpadyamāno dharmo yenālambanenotpadyate,
SA10canprasu:191_6: ta ete catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ / ye cānye purojātasahajātapaścājjātādayaḥ,
SA10canprasu:191_7: te eteṣveva antarbhūtāḥ / īśvarādayastu pratyayā eva na saṃbhavantīti,
SA10canprasu:191_8: ata evāvadhārayati- pratyayo nāsti pañcama iti /
SA10canprasu:192_0: atrocyate- naiva hi bhāvānāṃ parabhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpattiriti / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:193_0: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10canprasu:194_0: iti / yadi hi hetvādiṣu parabhuteṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyastasamasteṣu hetupratyaya sāmagyā anyatra vā kvacid bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmutpādātpūrvaṃ sattvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:194_1: syāttebhya utpādaḥ / na caivaṃ yadutpādātpūrvaṃ saṃbhavaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:194_2: yadi syāt, gṛhyeta ca, utpādavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt / tasmānnaṃ cāsti bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu svabhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:194_4: bhavanaṃ bhāva utpādaḥ, parebhya utpādaḥ parabhāvaḥ, sa na vidyate / tasmādayuktametat parabhūtebhyo bhāvānā mutpattiriti /
SA10canprasu:195_0: athavā bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmaṅkurādīnāṃ vījādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsvavikṛtarūpeṣu nāsti svabhāvo nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:196_0: tatkimapekṣaṃ paratvaṃ pratyayādīnām? vidyamānayoreva hi maitropagrāhakayoḥ parasparāpekṣaṃ paratvam? na caivaṃ bījāṅkurayoryaugapadyam /
SA10canprasu:196_1: tasmādavidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ paratvaṃ bījādīnāṃ nāstīti paravyapadeśābhāvādeva na parata utpāda iti /
SA10canprasu:197_0: tadevaṃ pratyayebhya utpādavādini pratiṣiddhe kriyāta utpādavādī manyate- na cakṣūrūpādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sākṣādvijñānaṃ janayanti /
SA10canprasu:199_0: yadi kriyā kācit syāt, sā cakṣurādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānaṃ janayet /
SA10canprasu:199_1: na [Pp_27] tvasti / kathaṃ kṛtvā? iha kriyeyamiṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:199_2: ajāte vā jāyamāne vā? tatra jāte na yuktā /
SA10canprasu:200_0: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam /
SA10canprasu:201_0: ityādinā ca madhyamakāvatāre pratipāditametat / ajāte 'pi na yuktā,
SA10canprasu:202_0: kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā /
SA10canprasu:203_0: ityādivacanāt / jāyamāne 'pi bhāve kriyā na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:204_1: atha vā jāyamānatvaṃ sarvasyaiva prasajyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:204_3: tasmānnāsti sā / ata evāha- kriyā na pratyayavatī iti /
SA10canprasu:206_0: ityādinā pratipāditametanmadhyamakāvatāre / na hi vandhyāputro gomānityucyate //
SA10canprasu:207_0: yadā pratyayavatī nāsti, tadā kathamapratyayavatī nirhetukā syāt? na hi tantumayaḥ paṭo na yukta iti vīraṇamayo 'bhyupagamyate /
SA10canprasu:208_0: atrāha- yadyevaṃ kriyāyā asaṃbhavaḥ, pratyayāstarhi janakā bhaviṣyanti bhāvānāmiti / ucyate-
SA10canprasu:210_0: yadā kriyā nāsti, tadā kriyārahitā akriyāvanto nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ kathaṃ janakāḥ? atha kriyāvanta eva janakā iti,
SA10canprasu:212_0: neti prakṛtenābhisaṃbandhaḥ / utaśabdo 'vadhāraṇe / tatra kriyāyā abhāva uktaḥ, kathaṃ kriyāvattvaṃ pratyayānāmiti? yathā ca vijñānajanikriyoktā,
SA10canprasu:212_1: evaṃ parikriyādayo 'pi bhāvā uktā veditavyā iti nāsti kriyāto 'pi samutpattirbhāvānāmiti bhavatyutpādābhidhānamarthaśūnyam /
SA10canprasu:213_0: atrāha- kiṃ na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayā ityādivicāreṇa? yasmāccakṣurādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñānādayo bhāvā jāyante,
SA10canprasu:215_0: yadi cakṣurādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānamutpadyate iti asya ime pratyayā ucyante,
SA10canprasu:215_1: nanu yāvattadvijñānākhyaṃ kāryaṃ notpadyate tāvadime cakṣurādayaḥ kathaṃ nāpratyayāḥ? apratyayā evetyabhiprāyaḥ na cāpratyayebhya utpattiḥ sikatābhya iva tailasya /
SA10canprasu:216_0: atha matam- pūrvamapratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcidanyaṃ pratyayamapekṣya pratyayatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti,
SA10canprasu:216_1: etadapyayuktam / yat tat pratyayāntaramapratyayasya tasya pratyayatvena kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:216_2: tadapi pratyayatve sati asya pratyayo bhavati /
SA10canprasu:217_0: kiṃ ca / iha ime cakṣurādayo vijñānasya pratyayāḥ kalpyamānāḥ sato vā asya kalpyeran,
SA10canprasu:217_1: asato vā? sarvathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
SA10canprasu:218_2: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim // 8 //
SA10canprasu:219_0: asato hyarthasya avidyamānasya kathaṃ pratyayaḥ syāt? bhaviṣyatā vyapadeśo bhaviṣyatīti cet,
SA10canprasu:221_0: ityādinoktadoṣatvāt / sato 'pi vidyamānasya labdhajanmano niṣphalaiva pratyayakalpanā //
SA10canprasu:222_0: evaṃ samastānāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāryotpādanāsāmarthyena apratyayatvamudbhāvya ataḥ paraṃ vyastānāmapratyayatvaṃ pratipādyate /
SA10canprasu:223_4: ucyate / syāddhetupratyayo yadi tasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:224_0: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10canprasu:224_1: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate // 9 //
SA10canprasu:225_0: tatra nirvartaka utpādakaḥ / yadi nirvartyo dharmo nirvarteta,
SA10canprasu:225_1: tamutpādako heturutpādayet / na tu nirvartate, sadasadubhayarūpasya nirvartyasyābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:225_6: hetupratyayo 'pyato nāsti / tataśca yaduktaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃbhavādvidyate hetupratyaya iti,
SA10canprasu:228_2: sa teṣāmālambanapratyayaḥ / ayaṃ ca vidyamānānāṃ vā parikalpyeta avidyamānānāṃ vā /
SA10canprasu:228_6: athaivamanālambane dharme svātmanā prasiddhe kimasya ālambanayogena parikalpitena,
SA10canprasu:228_7: ityanālambana evāyaṃ san vidyamāno dharmaḥ cittādikaḥ kevalaṃ sālambana ityucyate bhavadbhiḥ svamanīṣikayā,
SA10canprasu:228_10: tadapi na yuktam, anālambana evāyamityādi / avidyamānasya hi nāsti ālambanena yogaḥ /
SA10canprasu:232_0: atha śabdaḥ praśne / kuta iti hetau / tenāyamarthaḥ- athaivamanālambane dharme 'sati avidyamāne bhūyaḥ kuta ālambanam? ālambanakābhāvādālambanasyāpyabhāva ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:232_1: kathaṃ tarhi sālambanāścittacaittāḥ? sāṃvṛtametallakṣaṇaṃ na pāramārthikamityadoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:235_2: tenaivaṃ pāṭhaḥ- niruddhe ca pratyayaḥ kaḥ? nānantaramato yuktam iti /
SA10canprasu:236_1: atra vicāryate- anutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kāryabhūteṣvaṅkurādiṣu nirodho nopapadyate kāraṇasya bījādeḥ /
SA10canprasu:236_2: yadaitadevam, tadā kāraṇasya nirodhābhāvādaṅkurasya kaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ? athānutpanne 'pi kārye bījanirodha iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:236_3: evaṃ sati niruddha bīje abhāvībhūte aṅkurasya kaḥ pratyayaḥ? ko vā bījanirodhasya pratyaya iti /
SA10canprasu:236_4: ubhayametadahetukamityāha- niruddhe ca kaḥ pratyaya iti /
SA10canprasu:236_6: tena anutpanne cāṅkure bījādīnāṃ nirodhe iṣyamāṇe 'pyubhayametadahetukamapadyata iti nānantaramato yuktam /
SA10canprasu:236_7: atha vā / na svato nāpi parata ityādinā utpādo niṣiddhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:243_0: bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
SA10canprasu:244_0: iha yasmin sati yadbhavati, tattasya ādhipateyamityadhipatipratyayalakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:244_1: bhāvānāṃ ca pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvābhāve kutastada yadasminniti kāraṇatvena vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:244_2: kutastad yadidamiti kāryatvena? tasmānnāsti lakṣaṇato 'pi pratyayasiddhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:245_0: atrāha- tantvādibhyaḥ paṭādikamupalabhya paṭādestantvādayaḥ pratyayā iti /
SA10canprasu:245_2: kutaḥ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ setsyati? yathā ca paṭādiphalapravṛttirasatī,
SA10canprasu:246_1: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat // 13 //
SA10canprasu:247_0: tatra vyasteṣu tantuturīvematasaraśalākādiṣu pratyayeṣu paṭo nāsti,
SA10canprasu:251_1: apratyayebhyo 'pi vīraṇādibhyaḥ kasmānnābhipravartate paṭa iti nāsti phalapravṛttiḥ svarūpataḥ /
SA10canprasu:252_0: atrāha- yadi anyat phalaṃ syādanye ca pratyayāḥ,
SA10canprasu:252_1: tadā kiṃ pratyayeṣu phalamasti nāstīti cintā syāt /
SA10canprasu:252_2: nāsti tu vyatiriktaṃ phalam, kiṃ tarhi pratyayamayameveti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:254_1: tadayuktam / yasmātte 'pi pratyayā asvayaṃmayā apratyayasvabhāvā ityarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:254_3: syāt paṭo yadi tantava eva [Pp_31] svabhāvasiddhāḥ syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:254_4: te hi aṃśumayā aṃśuvikārā na svabhāvasiddhāḥ /
SA10canprasu:260_0: iti tantumayo yadā paṭo nāsti, tadā kathaṃ vīraṇamayaḥ syā?
SA10canprasu:261_1: tathā ca bhavān bravīti- yadi asat phalaṃ pratyayebhyaḥ pravartate,
SA10canprasu:261_3: na cāsati phale paṭakaṭākhye tantuvīraṇānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyayatvaṃ yuktam,
SA10canprasu:261_4: ataḥ phalamapyastīti / ucyate / syātphalaṃ yadi pratyayāpratyayā eva syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:261_5: sati hi phale ime 'sya pratyayā ime 'pratyayā iti syāt /
SA10canprasu:264_0: śūnyavidya na hi vidyate kvaci antarīkṣi śakunasya vā padam /
SA10canprasu:264_1: yo na vidyati sabhāvataḥ kvaci so na jātu parahetu bheṣyati //
SA10canprasu:264_2: yasya naiva hi sabhāvu labhyati so 'svabhāvu parapaccayaḥ katham /
SA10canprasu:264_3: asvabhāvu paru kiṃ janīṣyati eṣa hetu sugatena deśitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:264_4: sarva dharma acalā dṛḍhaṃ sthitā nirvikāra nirupadravāḥ śivāḥ /
SA10canprasu:264_7: śailaparvata yathā akampiyā evaṃ dharma avikampiyāḥ sadā /
SA10canprasu:264_8: no cyavati na pi copapadyayu evaṃ dharmata jinena deśitā // ityādi /
SA10canprasu:266_0: yo na pi jāyati nā cupapadyī no cyavate na pi jīryati dharmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:266_1: taṃ jinu deśayatī narasiṃhaḥ tatra niveśayi sattvaśatāni /
SA10canprasu:266_2: yasya sabhāvu na vidyati kaści no parabhāvatu kenaci labdhaḥ /
SA10canprasu:266_3: nāntarato na pi bāhirato vā labhyati tatra niveśayi nāthaḥ //
SA10canprasu:266_4: śānta gatī kathitā sugatena no ca gati upalabhyati kāci /
SA10canprasu:266_5: tatra ca voharasī gatimukto muktaku mocayamī bahusattvān // iti vistaraḥ // 16 //
SA10canprasu:267_0: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau pratyayaparīkṣā nāma prathamaṃ prakaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:269_2: ucyate / yadi gamanaṃ nāma syānniyataṃ tadgate vā adhvajāte parikalpyeta agate gamyamāne vā /
SA10canprasu:270_0: gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate /
SA10canprasu:271_2: yadgatamuparatagamikriyaṃ tadvartamānagamikriyāyogavācinā gamyate ityanena śabdenocyamānamasaṃbaddhamiti kṛtvā gataṃ tāvad gamyata iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:272_0: agatamapi na gamyate / agataṃ hi anupajātagamikriyamanāgatamucyate,
SA10canprasu:272_1: gamyata iti ca vartamānam / ato 'nāgatavartamānayoratyantabhedādagatamapi gamyata iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:272_2: yadi agataṃ kathaṃ gamyate, atha gamyate na tadagatamiti /
SA10canprasu:275_0: iha hi gantā yaṃ deśamatikrāntaḥ sa tasya deśo gataḥ,
SA10canprasu:275_2: na ca gatāgatavyatirekeṇa tṛtīyamaparamadhvajātaṃ paśyāmo gamyamānaṃ nāma /
SA10canprasu:275_4: gamyata iti na prajñāyate, tasmānnāsti gamyamānam / ato na tad gamikriyayā āviśyate na gamyata iti nāsti gamyamāne 'pi gamanam /
SA10canprasu:276_1: sa gamyamānaḥ syāditi / naivam, caraṇayorapi paramāṇusāṃghātatvāt /
SA10canprasu:276_3: sa tasya gate 'ntargataḥ / pārṣṇyavasthitasya caramaparamāṇorya uttaro deśaḥ,
SA10canprasu:276_4: sa tasya agate 'ntargataḥ / na ca paramāṇuvyatirekeṇa caraṇamasti /
SA10canprasu:276_6: yathā caivaṃ caraṇe vicāraḥ, evaṃ paramāṇūnāmapi pūrvāparadigbhāgasaṃbandhena vicāraḥ kārya iti /
SA10canprasu:277_0: tatrāha- gamyata eva gamyamānam / iha hi-
SA10canprasu:278_0: ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
SA10canprasu:278_1: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ // 2 //
SA10canprasu:279_2: yato vrajato ganturyatra deśe ceṣṭā gatiḥ tatraiva deśe /
SA10canprasu:279_3: sā ca ceṣṭā na gate 'dhvani saṃbhavati nāpyagate,
SA10canprasu:279_4: kiṃ tu gamyamāna eva / tataśca gamyamāne gatiḥ / yatra hi gatirupalabhyate tadgamyamānam,
SA10canprasu:279_5: tacca gamikriyayā āviśyate / tasmād gamyamānameva gamyate iti /
SA10canprasu:280_0: evamapi parikalpyamāne gamyamānaṃ na gamyata ityāha-
SA10canprasu:282_1: tacca iti gamyata bravīti / ekā cātra gamikriyā, tayā gamyamānavyapadeśo bhavatu kāmamadhvanaḥ /
SA10canprasu:282_2: gamyata iti bhūyaḥ kriyāsaṃbandho gamyamānasya na yujyata iti
SA10canprasu:286_3: gamyata ityayaṃ vyapadeśo vinā gamanena yadā naivopapadyate,
SA10canprasu:286_4: tadā gamyamānaṃ gamyata iti paripūrṇo vākyārtho nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:287_1: evaṃ sati gamyamānavyapadeśe nāsti kriyāsaṃbandha iti na paripūrṇatā vākyārthasyetyāha-
SA10canprasu:289_3: gatirahitaṃ gamanaṃ syāt, yasmādasya gamyamānaṃ hi gamyate /
SA10canprasu:289_4: hi śabdo yasmādarthe / yasmād gatirahitameva gamyamānaṃ sat tasya vādino gamyate,
SA10canprasu:290_0: atha ubhayatrāpi kriyāsaṃbandha iṣyate gamyamāne gamyate ityatra ca, evamapi-

SA10canprasu:292_1: tadekaṃ gamanam // tatra gamyamāne 'dhikaraṇabhute dvitīyaṃ gamanaṃ yena so 'dhvā gamyate /

SA10canprasu:299_0: atrāha- yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi gantari devadatte gamanamupalabhyate devadatto gacchatīti vyapadeśāt /
SA10canprasu:299_2: ucyate / syādevaṃ yadi gamanāśrayo gantā syāt,
SA10canprasu:301_1: tataśca gantāraṃ cetiraskṛtya pratyākhyāya gamanaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:301_2: asati gamane kuto nirhetuko gantā? ato nāsti gamanam /
SA10canprasu:302_0: atrāha- vidyata eva gamanam, tadvatastena vyapadeśāt / iha gantā gamanena yuktaḥ, tadyogācca gacchati / yadi gamanaṃ na syāt, gamanavato devadattasya gacchatīti vyapadeśo na syāt,
SA10canprasu:302_2: ucyate / syādgamanam, yadi gacchatītyevaṃ vyapadeśaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:303_0: gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati /
SA10canprasu:304_0: iha gacchatīti gantā, sa tāvanna gacchati, yathā ca na gacchati tathottareṇa ślokatrayeṇa pratipādayiṣyati /
SA10canprasu:304_1: agantāpi na gacchati / agantā hi nāma yo gamikriyārahitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:304_4: nāsau agantā iti / tadubhayavyatirikto gacchatīti cennaivam /
SA10canprasu:304_5: ko hi ganturaganturvinirmuktastṛtīyo 'sti yo gacchatīti kalpyeta? tasmānnāsti gamanam /
SA10canprasu:307_2: ganteti tu vyapadeśe nāsti dvitīyā gamikriyā iti /
SA10canprasu:307_3: gamanena vinā gantā, agacchan ganteti yadā na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:307_5: kāmaṃ gacchatītyastu, ganteti tu na saṃbhavatīti tadayuktam /
SA10canprasu:308_0: atha gatiyogātsagatika eva gantā, tathāpi dvitīyagamikriyābhāvadgacchatīti vyapadeśo na syādityāha-

SA10canprasu:310_1: tasya ganturgamanamicchataḥ sagamanagantṛvyapadeśādgamanena vinā gantā gacchatīti syāt,
SA10canprasu:310_2: dvitīyagamikriyābhāvāt / ato gantā gacchatīti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:310_3: gacchatītyetasyārthe ganteti śabdo gamanena vinā gantetyatra vākye /
SA10canprasu:311_0: atha ubhayatrāpi gatiyoga iṣyate gantā gacchatīti, evamapi-
SA10canprasu:312_0: gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
SA10canprasu:312_1: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati // 11 //
SA10canprasu:313_0: yena gamanena yogād gantetyucyate vyapadiśyate tadekaṃ gamanam /
SA10canprasu:313_1: gantā bhavan yacca gacchati, yāṃ ca gatikriyāṃ karoti, tadetadgamanadvayaṃ prasaktam /

SA10canprasu:314_2: uta agantā gacchati, tadvayatirikto veti / sarvathā ca nopapadyata iti yatkiṃcidetat /
SA10canprasu:314_3: atrāha- vidyata eva gamanam, tadārambhasadbhāvāt / iha devadattaḥ sthityupamardena gamanamārabhate /

SA10canprasu:315_1: yadi gamanārambho bhavet, tad gate vādhvanyāramyeta, agate vā gamyamāne vā / tatra gate gamanaṃ nārabhyate,

SA10canprasu:316_0: yathā ca gamanaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:317_0: na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
SA10canprasu:318_1: sa tadā gamanaṃ nārabhate / tasya gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gamyamānamadhvajātamasti,
SA10canprasu:319_0: atha syāt- yadyapi gamanārambhātpūrvaṃ na gataṃ na gamyamānaṃ tathāpyagatamasti,

SA10canprasu:320_2: na cāsati gamane etāni yujyanta iti /
SA10canprasu:320_4: sati hi gamikriyāprārambhe yatroparatā gamikriyā tad gatamiti parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:320_6: yatrājātā tadagatamiti / yadā tu gamikriyāprārambha eva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:321_0: gataṃ kiṃ gamyamanaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
SA10canprasu:323_1: yasya ca pratipakṣo 'sti, tadasti, ālokāndhakāravat pārāvāravat saṃśayaniścayavacca /
SA10canprasu:323_3: ucyate / syād gamanaṃ yadi tatpratipakṣaḥ sthānaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:323_4: kathamihedaṃ sthānaṃ ganturagantustadanyasya vā parikalpyeta? sarvathā ca na yujyata ityāha-
SA10canprasu:324_0: gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
SA10canprasu:325_0: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tathottareṇa ślokenākhyāsyati /
SA10canprasu:325_1: agantāpi na tiṣṭhati, sa hi tiṣṭhatyeva, tasya kimaparayā sthityā prayojanam? agantāpi na tiṣṭhati? sa hi tiṣṭhatyeva,
SA10canprasu:325_2: tasya [Pp_38] kimaparayā sthityā prayojanam? ekayā sthityā agantā aparayā tiṣṭhatīti sthitidvayaprasaṅgāt sthātṛdvayaprasaṅga iti pūrvavaddoṣaḥ /
SA10canprasu:326_0: atrāha- nāgantā tiṣṭhati, nāpi ganturagantuścānyaḥ, kiṃ tarhi gantaiva tiṣṭhatīti naivam / yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:328_0: yadāyaṃ tiṣṭhatītyucyate, tadā sthitivirodhi gamanamasya nāsti,
SA10canprasu:329_0: atrāha- vidyata eva gamanam, tannivṛttisadbhāvāt / iha gaternivartamānaḥ sthitimārabhate gamanābhāve tu na tato nivarteta /
SA10canprasu:329_1: ucyate / syād gamanaṃ yadi tannivṛttireva syāt /
SA10canprasu:331_0: tatra gantā gatādadhvano na nivartate gatyabhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:331_1: agatādapi, gatyabhāvādeva / gamyamānādapi na nivartate tadanupalabdheḥ gamikriyābhāvācca /
SA10canprasu:332_2: tatsiddhau gamanasiddhiḥ / tasmādvidyata eva sthānaṃ pratidvandvisadbhāvāt,
SA10canprasu:334_0: atra hi yadgamanaṃ sthitisiddhaye varṇitaṃ tadgatyā samaṃ gatidūṣaṇena tulyamityarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:334_1: yathā gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadityādinā gatiprasiddhaye sthiterhetutvenopāttāyā dūṣaṇamuktam,
SA10canprasu:334_2: evamihāpi sthitiprasiddhaye gamanasya hetutvenopāttasya sthātā na gacchati tāvadityādinā ślokadvayapāṭhaparivartena dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nāsti gamanam,
SA10canprasu:334_4: evaṃ tāvad gamanaṃ gatyā tulyaṃ pratyākhyeyam /
SA10canprasu:335_0: atha syāt- vidyata eva sthānaṃ tadārambhasadbhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:335_2: kathaṃ tanna syāt? ucyate / saṃpravṛttiśca gateḥ samā vācyā /
SA10canprasu:335_3: tatra yathā pūrvaṃ gate nārabhyate gantumityādinā gamanārambho niṣiddhaḥ,
SA10canprasu:341_0: iti gatyā tulyaṃ dūṣaṇamiti nāsti sthitiḥ /
SA10canprasu:342_0: api ca / yadi gamanaṃ syāt, gantṛvyatirekeṇa vā syādavyatirekeṇa vā? sarvathā ca vicāryamāṇaṃ na saṃbhavatītyāha-
SA10canprasu:343_0: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:343_1: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate // 18 //
SA10canprasu:345_0: yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi /
SA10canprasu:345_1: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca // 19 //
SA10canprasu:346_0: yeyaṃ gamikriyā, sā yadi ganturavyatiriktā nānyā syāt,
SA10canprasu:346_2: tataśca iyaṃ kriyā, ayaṃ kartā, iti viśeṣo na syāt / na ca chidikriyāyāḥ chettuśca ekatvam /
SA10canprasu:346_3: ato yadeva gamanaṃ sa eva ganteti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:349_2: gantṛnirapekṣaṃ ca gamanaṃ gṛhyeta pṛthak siddhaṃ ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ /
SA10canprasu:349_3: na ca gantuḥ pṛthaksiddhaṃ gamanaṃ gṛhyata iti /
SA10canprasu:349_4: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate iti prasādhitametat /
SA10canprasu:351_1: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // 21 //
SA10canprasu:352_0: yayorgantṛgamanayoryathoditanyāyena ekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:352_1: tayoridānīṃ kenānyena prakāreṇa siddhirastu? ata āha- tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyata iti /
SA10canprasu:353_1: atrāha- iha devadatto gantā gacchatīti lokaprasiddham /
SA10canprasu:353_3: kartā kriyāṃ karoti, iti prasiddham, evaṃ yayā gatyā gantetyabhivyajyate tāṃ gacchatīti na yathoktadoṣaḥ /

SA10canprasu:355_1: sa gantā san tāṃ tāvanna gacchati,
SA10canprasu:355_2: na prāpnoti yadi vā na karotītyarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:357_0: gateḥ pūrvo gatipūrvaḥ / yadi gantā gateḥ pūrvaṃ siddhaḥ syāt, sa tāṃ gacchet / katham yasmāt-
SA10canprasu:359_0: kaściddevadattaḥ kiṃcidarthāntarabhūtaṃ grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā gacchatīti dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:359_2: tasyāḥ pūrvaṃ siddharūpo gatinirapekṣo gantā nāma asti yastāṃ gacchet /
SA10canprasu:361_0: gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:362_1: tato 'nyāmapi sa gantā san na gacchati,
SA10canprasu:362_3: gantā san yāṃ cāparāṃ gacchatītyetad gatidvayaṃ prasaktam /
SA10canprasu:362_5: ityuktametat / etena vaktā vācaṃ bhāṣate kartā kriyāṃ karoti,
SA10canprasu:364_0: sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:365_5: tatra sadbhūto gantā sadbhūtamasadbhūtaṃ sadasadbhūtaṃ triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:365_7: evamasadbhūto 'pi gantā triprakāraṃ gamanaṃ na gacchati /
SA10canprasu:366_0: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate // 25 //
SA10canprasu:368_2: yatra na saṃkarṣaṇapadaṃ na niṣkarṣaṇapadaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ padam /
SA10canprasu:369_2: athāṅkuro 'nyata āgacchati, ahetukadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ syāt / na cāhetukasyotpattiḥ kharaviṣāṇasyeva /
SA10canprasu:371_0: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA10canprasu:371_1: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā // iti //

SA10canprasu:373_1: so tatra rāgaṃ janayitva bālo pradhāvito kāmi gaveṣamāṇo //
SA10canprasu:373_2: mukhasya saṃkrānti yadā na vidyate bimbe mukhaṃ naiva kadāci labhyate /

SA10canprasu:375_0: tahi kāli so daśabalo anagho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /

SA10canprasu:375_9: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /

SA10canprasu:375_12: na ca āgataṃ na ca ihopagataṃ śūnyānimitta sada saṃtatiyo //
SA10canprasu:375_13: anutpāda śānta animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocara jināna guṇā /

SA10canprasu:377_0: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau gatāgataparīkṣā nāma dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:379_0: atrāha- yadyapi gatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate,
SA10canprasu:380_0: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10canprasu:381_1: ucyate / na santi / iha hi paśyatīti darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ,
SA10canprasu:382_0: yathā darśanaṃ rūpaṃ na paśyati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:383_0: svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati /
SA10canprasu:383_1: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān // 2 //
SA10canprasu:384_0: tatra tadeva darśanaṃ svātmānaṃ na paśyati svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
SA10canprasu:385_2: tathā hi agniḥparātmānameva dahati na svātmānam,
SA10canprasu:385_3: evaṃ darśanaṃ parāneva drakṣyati na svātmānamiti /
SA10canprasu:387_1: sa na paryāpto nālaṃ na samartho na yujyata ityarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:389_2: so 'pi saha darśanena dārṣṭāntikārthena pratyukto dūṣitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:389_4: yathā gataṃ na gamyate nāgataṃ na gamyamānam,
SA10canprasu:389_5: evamagnināpi dagdhaṃ na dahyate nādagdhaṃ dahyata ityādinā samaṃ vācyam /
SA10canprasu:389_6: yathā ca na gataṃ nāgataṃ na gamyamānaṃ gamyate,
SA10canprasu:390_0: na dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate tāvadadṛṣṭaṃ naiva dṛśyate /
SA10canprasu:392_0: yathā ca gantā na gacchati tāvadityādyuktam,
SA10canprasu:392_1: evaṃ na dagdhā dahati tāvadityādi vācyam /
SA10canprasu:392_2: evaṃ na draṣṭā paśyati tāvadityādinā agnidṛṣṭāntena saha gamyamānagatāgatairyasmātsamaṃ dūṣaṇam,
SA10canprasu:392_4: tataśca siddhametat- svātmavad darśanaṃ parānapi na paśyatīti /

SA10canprasu:395_4: tathāpi vyākhyānakāle paśyatīti darśanamityevaṃ kathametattu yujyate iti paṭhitavyam /

SA10canprasu:396_1: adarśanasvabhāvasya vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
SA10canprasu:398_0: darśanasvabhāvasya tāvad dṛśikriyāyuktasya bhūyaḥ paśyatītyādinā saṃbandho nopapadyate dṛśikriyādvayaprasaṅgāt darśanadvayaprasaṅgācca /
SA10canprasu:403_0: ye tu manyante- nirvyāpāraṃ hīdaṃ dharmamātramutpadyamānamutpadyate iti,

SA10canprasu:409_1: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān //
SA10canprasu:410_0: ityādi vācyam / tasmāddarśanavad draṣṭāpi nāstīti siddham // 5 //

SA10canprasu:614_2: yasmādiha saṃskṛtadharmaḥ kuśalaḥ kliṣṭo vā utpadyamānaḥ ātmanā pañcadaśaḥ utpadyate /
SA10canprasu:614_3: sa dharmastasya cotpādaḥ samanvāgamaḥ sthitirjarā anityatā /
SA10canprasu:614_5: tasya mithyāvimuktiḥ / atha śubhaḥ, tasya samyagvimuktiḥ / yadi nairyāṇiko bhavati tasya nairyāṇikatā /

SA10canprasu:614_9: evaṃ yāvadanairyāṇikatā caturdaśa dharmān na niryāṇayati,

SA10canprasu:634_0: atha manyase- yathā aprāptāmeva avidyāṃ jñānaṃ nihanti,
SA10canprasu:634_1: aprāptameva rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ paśyati aprāptameva ayaḥ ayaskānto maṇirākarṣati,

SA10canprasu:636_1: evaṃ sati, ihastha eva pradīpaḥ sarvalokasthaṃ tamo nihaniṣyati,
SA10canprasu:636_4: cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanam, ayaskāntamaṇinā ayaākarṣaṇamiva ityevamādikaṃ sādhyasamaṃ jñeyam /
SA10canprasu:637_0: atha aprāptāvapi satyāmayaskāntamaṇiprabhṛtīnāṃ yogyadeśāvasthānāmeva svakāryakṛtvaṃ debhaviṣyatīti cet,
SA10canprasu:637_1: tadapi na yuktam / aprāptau hi satyāṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśāntarāvasthitavadavyavahitaśāntarāvasthita vacca aprāptatvād yogyadeśāvasthitānāmapi yogyadeśāvasthitatvaṃ na yuktamiti kuto yogyadeśāvasthitānāṃ svakāryakṛttvaṃ prasetsyati?

SA10canprasu:638_4: yathoditaṃ tu vicāramanavatārya pradīpena tamo hatam,

SA10canprasu:640_1: tamaso 'pi tarhi pratipakṣa bhūtasya svaparātmanoḥ pracchādanaṃ prakalpyatamityāha-

SA10canprasu:643_4: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām /
SA10canprasu:643_5: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭhupadeśita yukti jinena // iti //
SA10canprasu:645_0: yathā hi dīpo layane cirasya kṛto hi gehe puruṣeṇa kenacit /

SA10canprasu:645_2: tamondhakārasya na śaktirasti kṛte pradīpe na vigacchanāya /

SA10canprasu:651_9: utpanno 'pi notpadyate, atītavartamānayorvirodhāt / utpanna ityuparatotpattikriya ucyate,

SA10canprasu:657_3: tataśca paramadharmabuddhadarśanamapi bādhitaṃ bhavati- yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati,

SA10canprasu:690_0: nirudhyamānasya nirodhābhimukhasya tāvadbhāvasya virodhinī sthitirna saṃbhavati /

SA10canprasu:693_0: ke hi nāma jarāmaraṇarahitā bhāvā yeṣāṃ sthitiḥ syāt? tasmānnāstyeva sthitirityabhiprāyaḥ // 24 //

SA10canprasu:1056_3: etacca nāstītyuktam / tataḥ svayaṃkṛtasyāprasiddheryadā manuṣyapudgalena svayaṃ tadduḥkhaṃ na kṛtam,
SA10canprasu:1056_4: tadā kutaḥ parapudgalasya devākhyasya tadduḥkhaṃ parakṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /

SA10canprasu:1059_4: sa eva tāvannātmanā kṛto nātmanā niṣpannaḥ tasyāpi hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt /

SA10canprasu:1107_15: śānta prajānati dharma praṇītān prīti sa vindati toṣati sattvān /

SA10canprasu:1109_1: śūnyatā ca bhāvānāmiṣyate, tasmādasti śūnyatāaśrayo bhāvasvabhāva iti,
SA10canprasu:1110_1: na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati // 7 //
SA10canprasu:1111_0: yadi śūnyatā nāma kācit syāt, tadā tadāśrayo bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1111_1: na tvevam / iha hi śūnyatā nāmeti sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamityabhyupagamāt aśūnyadharmābhāvādaśūnyataiva nāsti /
SA10canprasu:1111_2: yadā ca aśūnyāḥ padārthā na santi,
SA10canprasu:1111_3: aśūnyatā ca nāsti, tadā pratipakṣanirapekṣatvācchūnyatāpi [Pp_108] khapuṣpamālāvannāstītyavasīyatām /
SA10canprasu:1111_4: yadā ca śūnyatā nāsti, tadātadāśrayā api padārthā na santīti sthitamavikalam /
SA10canprasu:1112_0: atrāha- trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākhyāni vimuktaye vineyebhyo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭāni sarvatīrthikasamayāsādhāraṇāni saugata eva pravacane samupalabhyante /
SA10canprasu:1112_1: yeṣāmupadeśārthameva buddhā bhagavanto 'śeṣatīrthyavādamahāmohāndhakārānugatajagati jagadekapradīpā nairātmyopadeśāvicchinnaśikhā utpadyante /
SA10canprasu:1112_2: sa bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena idānīṃ tāmeva śūnyatāṃ pratikṣeptumārabdhavān,
SA10canprasu:1112_4: ucyate / aho vata bhavānatyunmukha iva atyantaviparyāsānnirvāṇapuragāminaṃ śivamṛjuṃ paramaṃ panthānamavadhūya bhāvābhiniveśavyā,
SA10canprasu:1112_5: kulitaṃ saṃsārakāntārānugameva mārgaṃ mokṣapuragāmitvena samāśrito nirmumukṣuḥ san saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ sadbhirupālabhya eva san abhimānābhiniveśagrahapavaraśatayā tānevopālabhate /
SA10canprasu:1114_0: iha sarveṣāmeva dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ sarvagrahābhiniveśānāṃ yaniḥsaraṇamapravṛttiḥ sā śūnyatā /
SA10canprasu:1114_3: tān prati avācakā vayamiti kuto 'smadupadeśāt sakalakalpanāvyāvṛttyā mokṣo bhaviṣyati? yaḥ nakiṃcidapi te paṇyaṃ dāsyāmītyuktaḥ,

SA10canprasu:1114_5: '; iti brūyāt, sa kenopāyena śakyaḥ paṇyābhāvaṃ grāhayitum? evaṃ yeṣāṃ śūnyatāyāmapi bhāvābhiniveśaḥ,
SA10canprasu:1114_6: kenedānīṃ sa teṣāṃ tasyāṃ bhāvābhiniveśo niṣidhyatāmiti? ato mahābhaiṣajye 'pi doṣasaṃjñitvāt paramacikitsakairmahāvaidyaistathāgataiḥ pratyākhyātā eva te /
SA10canprasu:1115_1: api tu dharmā eva śūnyāḥ / yannānimittena dharmānanimittān karoti,

SA10canprasu:1118_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ hi kāśyapa śūnyatā niḥsaraṇam /

SA10canprasu:1142_4: tadā ca paṭanirapekṣasyaiva ekaikasya ghaṭasya anyatvaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:1142_5: yaddhi yasmādanyat, tattena vināpi siddhayati / tadyathā / sa eva ghaṭo na svarūpaniṣpattāvanyaṃ paṭamapekṣate /
SA10canprasu:1142_8: na tu ekaikasya paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam/
SA10canprasu:1143_1: nanu idamapi tadā na saṃbhavati vaktum- yasmādanyatpratītya anyadanyadbhavatīti,
SA10canprasu:1143_3: ucyate / yata eva hi parasparāpekṣikī bhāvānāmanyatvasiddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:1143_4: ata eva anyadityucyate laukike vyavahāre sthitvā /
SA10canprasu:1144_0: yadi tarhi evamapyavidyamāne 'pyanyatve lokasaṃvṛtyā paṭādanyo ghaṭa iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:1144_1: atha kasmād bījāṅkurayorapi evamanyatvaṃ na vyapadiśyate? ucyate /
SA10canprasu:1144_2: naiva hi loko ghaṭapaṭayoriva bījāṅkurayoranyatvaṃ pratipadyate,
SA10canprasu:1144_4: yaugapadyabhāvaprasaṅgāt / api ca / yasmādbījamātramu tvā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣamupadarśayati pumān loke- ayaṃ vṛkṣo mayopta iti,
SA10canprasu:1145_1: atrāha- yadi padārthāntare padārthāntarasāpekṣā parabuddhiḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1145_3: na tvevaṃ brūmaḥ / kiṃ tarhi iha anyatvaṃ nāma sāmānyaviśeṣo 'sti,
SA10canprasu:1145_4: tadyatra samavetam sa padārthaḥ padārthāntaranirapekṣayāpi para ityucyate,
SA10canprasu:1145_6: ucyate syādetadevam, yadi anyatvameva syāt, na tvasti / ihedamanyatvaṃ kalpyamānamanyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyata iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1147_1: kiṃ tadānīmanyatvaparikalpanayā? anyavyapadeśasiddhayarthaṃ hi bhavatā anyatvaṃ parikalpyate /
SA10canprasu:1147_2: sa ca anyavyapadeśo vināpyanyatvena siddha eva,
SA10canprasu:1147_4: ityevaṃ tāvadanyasminnanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idānīmananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1147_5: yasmādananya ucyate ekaḥ, tatra ca anyatvaviruddhamekatvamastīti yataḥ virodhādananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:1147_6: yacca idānīṃ nānyasminnananyasmin vidyate tadvayatiriktasya padārthāntarasyāsaṃbhavād etadvayatirikte 'pi padārthe na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:1147_8: tadā anyatvasamavāyanibandhanaḥ anyabuddhidhvanipravṛttiheturanyo 'pi padārtho nāstīti siddham /
SA10canprasu:1148_1: tathāpi anyastāvadasti / na ca asati anyatve anyo bhavitumarhati,
SA10canprasu:1150_1: tadā kutaḥ asati anyatve anyadvā tadeva vā bhaviṣyati? tadeveti ananyatvamityarthaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1151_1: saṃsargasadbhāvāt / iha darśanādīnāṃ yadyapi anyatvaṃ nāstīti pratipāditam,
SA10canprasu:1151_2: tathāpi trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ saṃgatiḥ sparśa iti saṃsargo 'sti /
SA10canprasu:1151_3: tataśca saṃsargasadbhāvād vidyanta eva darśanādaya iti /
SA10canprasu:1151_4: ucyate / syurevam, yadi teṣāṃ saṃsarga eva syāt /
SA10canprasu:1152_0: na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1153_1: sa ekatvena vā parikalpyeta anyatvena vā? tatra ekatve nāsti saṃsargaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1153_2: na hi ekakaṃ kṣīramudakanirapekṣamudakena saṃsṛjyata ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:1153_4: na hi udakātpṛthagavasthitaṃ kṣīramudakena saṃsṛjyata iti kathyate /
SA10canprasu:1153_5: evaṃ darśanādīnāṃ yadi ekatve sati saṃsargaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:1153_7: atha pṛthaktvam, evamapyanupapannaḥ / ekakasyāpi cakṣuṣo rūpādibhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtasya saṃsṛṣṭiprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:1154_2: tadapratiṣedhāt / na ca saṃsargamantareṇa saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:1154_4: ucyate / etadapi na yuktam / yasmādyadā saṃsarga eva nāstīti pratipāditam,
SA10canprasu:1154_5: asati ca [Pp_113] saṃsarge tadā kutaḥ saṃsṛjyamānādikam? tatra vartamānasaṃsargakriyāsādhanakarmabhūtaṃ saṃsṛjyamānam,
SA10canprasu:1157_0: sarvasayogi tu paśyati cakṣustatra na paśyati pratyayahīnam /
SA10canprasu:1157_2: ālokasamāśrita paśyati cakṣu rūpa manorama citravicitram /
SA10canprasu:1157_3: yena ca yogasamāśrita cakṣustena na paśyati cakṣu kadāci //
SA10canprasu:1157_4: te parinirvṛta laukika śūrā yehi svabhāvata jñātibhi dharmāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1157_5: kāmaguṇairhi caranti asaṅgāḥ saṅga vivarjiya sattva vinenti //
SA10canprasu:1157_6: no pi ca sattva na jīviha kaści sattvahitaṃ ca karonti jinendrāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1157_7: ............. sattvu na asti karonti ca artham //
SA10canprasu:1159_0: bhāvitu mārga pavartitu jñāna śūnyaka dharma nirātmaka sarvi /
SA10canprasu:1160_0: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau saṃsargaparīkṣā nāma caturdaśamaṃ prakaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:1162_2: iha yannāsti na tasya niṣpādakahetupratyayopādānamasti yathā khapuṣpasya /
SA10canprasu:1162_3: upādīyante ca bījāvidyādayo hetupratyayā aṅkarasaṃskārādīnāṃ niṣpādakāḥ,
SA10canprasu:1162_7: yathā vartamānībhūtānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ bhūyoniṣpattaye avidyābījādīnāmupādānaṃ kriyate evamanyadapi tadutpattaye na kartavyaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1164_0: atha syāt- naivotpādātpūrvaṃ kasyacidbhāvasya svabhāvo 'sti yato 'sya vidyamānatvādutpattivaiyarthyaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1164_1: kiṃ tarhi utpādātpūrvamavidyamānasyaiva svabhāvasya hetupratyayān pratītya paścādutpādo bhavatīti /
SA10canprasu:1166_0: atha syāt- iṣyata eva hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvātsvabhāvasya kṛtakatvam,
SA10canprasu:1166_1: tasmātkṛtakasyaiva svabhāvasyābhyupagamāt kṛtakatvaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ bādhaka iti,
SA10canprasu:1167_0: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10canprasu:1168_1: iha hi svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti vyutpatteḥ,
SA10canprasu:1168_2: yaḥ kṛtakaḥ padārthaḥ, sa loke naiva svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
SA10canprasu:1168_4: yastu akṛtakaḥ sa svabhāvaḥ, tadyathā agnerauṣṇyaṃ jātānāṃ padmarāgādīnāṃ padmarāgādisvabhāvaśca /
SA10canprasu:1168_6: tadevamakṛtakaḥ svabhāva iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayamidānīṃ brūmaḥ- yadetadauṣṇyaṃ tadaṣyagneḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti gṛhyatāṃ kṛtakatvāt,
SA10canprasu:1168_10: tataśca kṛtakam, kṛtakatvāccāpāmauṣṇyavat svabhāvo naiva bhavatīti sphuṭamavasīyate /
SA10canprasu:1169_0: nanu ca gopālāṅganājanaprasiddhametad agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāva iti /
SA10canprasu:1169_1: kiṃ khalu asmābhiruktaṃ na prasiddhamiti? etattu vayaṃ brūmaḥ- nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhavitumarhati svabhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt /
SA10canprasu:1169_2: avidyāviparyāsānugamāttu loko niḥsvabhāvameva bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvena pratipannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1169_3: yathā hi [Pp_115] taimirikāḥ timirapratyayādasantameva keśādisvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭāḥ,
SA10canprasu:1169_4: evamavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā bālā niḥsvabhāvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ sasvabhāvatvenābhiniviṣṭā yathābhiniveśaṃ lakṣaṇamācakṣate agnerauṣṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇam /
SA10canprasu:1169_6: bālajanaprasiddhayaiva ca bhagavatā tadevaiṣāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ svarūpamabhidharme vyavasthāpitam /
SA10canprasu:1169_9: tadā vitimiraiḥ taimirikopalabdhakeśādarśanavat bālajanamatiparikalpitānupalabdhasvabhāvairāryaiḥ pura ucyate parahitavyāpāraiḥ,
SA10canprasu:1170_2: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna ca vastu na cālayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1172_0: svabhāvānutpattiṃ saṃdhāya mahāmate mayā sarvadharmā anutpannā ityuktāḥ // iti vistaraḥ //
SA10canprasu:1173_0: atrāha- yadi khalu idamagnyāderauṣṇyādikaṃ hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvena kṛtakatvānniḥsvabhāvamityucyate,
SA10canprasu:1173_1: kimidānīṃ tatsvabhāvasya lakṣaṇaṃ kaścāsau svabhāva iti vaktavyam /
SA10canprasu:1174_0: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca // 2 //
SA10canprasu:1175_0: iha svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti yasya padārthasya yadātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tattasya svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:1175_2: yattu kṛtrimaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā apāmauṣṇyam /
SA10canprasu:1175_3: yacca yasyāyattaṃ tadapi tadātmīyaṃ tadyathā sve bhṛtyāḥ,
SA10canprasu:1175_4: svāni dhanāni / yattu yasya parāyattaṃ na tattasyātmīyaṃ tadyathā tāvatkālikāyācitakamasvatantram /
SA10canprasu:1175_5: yataścaivaṃ kṛtrimasya parasāpekṣasya ca svabhāvatvaṃ neṣṭam,
SA10canprasu:1175_6: ata eva auṣṇyamagnerhetupratyayapratibaddhatvātpūrvaṃmabhūtvā paścādutpādena kṛtakatvānna svabhāva iti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1175_7: yataścaitadevam, ato yadevāgneḥ kālatraye 'pyavyabhicāri nijaṃ rūpamakṛtrimam,
SA10canprasu:1175_9: yacca hetupratyayasāpekṣaṃ na bhavati apāmauṣṇyavat pārāvāravat dīrghahrasvavadvā,
SA10canprasu:1175_11: kiṃ khalu agneḥ taditthaṃ svarūpamasti? na tadasti,
SA10canprasu:1175_12: na cāpi nāsti svarūpataḥ / yadyapi evam, tathāpi śrotṛṇāmuttrāsaparivarjanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyā samāropya tadastīti brūmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1176_0: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
SA10canprasu:1178_2: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate //
SA10canprasu:1179_1: kīdṛśaṃ tat? yā sā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā nāma,
SA10canprasu:1179_2: saiva tatsvarūpam / atha keyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā? dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1180_0: etaduktaṃ bhavati- avidyātimiraprabhāvopalabdhaṃ bhāvajātaṃ yenātmanā vigatāvidyātimirāṇāmāryāṇāmadarśanayogena viṣayatvamupayāti,
SA10canprasu:1180_2: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca /
SA10canprasu:1180_4: sa caiṣa bhāvānāmanutpādātmakaḥ svabhāva akiṃcittvena abhāvamātratvādasvabhāva eveti kṛtvā nāsti bhāvasvabhāva iti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:1181_0: bhāvānabhāvāniti yaḥ prajānati sa sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate /
SA10canprasu:1181_1: yaḥ sarvabhāveṣu na jātu sajjate sa ānimittaṃ spṛśate samādhim //
SA10canprasu:1183_1: tathāpi parabhāvastāvadasti, tadapratiṣedhāt sati ca parabhāve svabhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:1185_0: iha svabhāva eva hi loke kaścitsvabhāvāntarāpekṣayā para iti vyapadiśyate /
SA10canprasu:1185_3: yadā tu mumukṣubhirvicāryamāṇasya kasyacitsvabhāva eva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1185_4: tadā kutaḥ paratvaṃ syāt? parabhāvācca svabhāvo 'pi nāsti iti siddham /
SA10canprasu:1186_1: tathāpi bhāvastāvadasti, apratiṣedhāt / sa ca bhāvo bhavan svabhāvo vā bhavet,
SA10canprasu:1187_1: svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati // 4 //
SA10canprasu:1188_1: bhāvo hi parikalpyamānaḥ svabhāvo vā bhavet,
SA10canprasu:1188_2: parabhāvo vā / tau ca pūrvoktavidhinā na staḥ,
SA10canprasu:1189_1: tathāpyabhāvo 'sti, pratiṣedhābhāvāt / tataśca bhāvo 'pi bhaviṣyati pratidvandvisadbhāvāt,
SA10canprasu:1191_0: iha hi yadi bhāvo nāma kaścidabhaviṣyat,
SA10canprasu:1191_2: ghaṭādayo hi vartamānāvasthāyāḥ pracyutāḥ santaḥ anyathābhāvamāpannāḥ abhāvadhvanivācyā bhavanti loke /
SA10canprasu:1192_0: tadevaṃ sarvathā svabhāvaparabhāvabhāvābhāveṣu anupapadyamāneṣu avidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītam-
SA10canprasu:1193_0: svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
SA10canprasu:1193_1: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane // 6 //
SA10canprasu:1194_3: anyadvijñānam, anyadrūpam, anyaiva ca vedanā, ityevaṃ parabhāvaṃ varṇayanti,
SA10canprasu:1194_4: vartamānāvasthaṃ ca vijñānādikaṃ bhāvatvena ye varṇayanti,
SA10canprasu:1194_6: na te paramagambhīrasya pratītyasamutpādasya tattvaṃ varṇayanti /
SA10canprasu:1194_10: ata eva buddhānāmeva bhagavatāṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇamityupavarṇayanti vicakṣaṇāḥ,
SA10canprasu:1194_12: ata eva ca āptebhyaḥ prahīṇāśeṣadoṣebhya āgatatvāt,
SA10canprasu:1194_14: āmimukhyādgamanādvā tadāśrayeṇa lokasya nirvāṇagamanāt saṃbuddhavacanasyaiva āgamatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA10canprasu:1198_1: yadbhūyasā kātyāyana ayaṃ loko 'stitāṃ vā abhiniviṣṭo nāstitāṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:1199_5: tena bhagavatā bhāvābhāvavibhāvinā yasmādastitvaṃca nāstitvaṃ ca ubhayametat pratiṣiddham,
SA10canprasu:1201_3: iyamucyate kāśyapa madhyamāṃ pratipad bhūtapratyavekṣā iti /
SA10canprasu:1203_0: astīti nāstīti ubhe 'pi antā śuddhī aśuddhīti ime 'pi antā /
SA10canprasu:1203_1: tasmādubhe anta vivarjayitvā madhye 'pi sthānaṃ na karoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA10canprasu:1203_2: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣaḥ śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1203_3: vivādaprāptyā na duḥkhaṃ praśāmyati avivādaprāptyā ca duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate // iti /
SA10canprasu:1204_0: atrāha- yadi punarevamagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvata evāstitvaṃ syāt, ko doṣaḥ syāt? uktadoṣaḥ-
SA10canprasu:1207_0: api ca / yadi ayameṣāmagnyādīnāṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1207_1: tasya vidyamānasya sato na syāt punaranyathātvamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1209_2: tadā asya svabhāvasya prakṛtyā vidyamānasya punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt /
SA10canprasu:1211_1: svabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā prakṛteravikāriṇītvānna kadācitpunaranyathābhāva upapadyeta /
SA10canprasu:1211_3: evamagnyādīnāmapi prakṛtyā vidyamānānāṃ punaranyathātvaṃ na syāt /
SA10canprasu:1212_0: atrāha- yadi prakṛtyā vidyamānasyānyathātvāsaṃbhavādanyathātvasya ca upalabhyamānatvāt prakṛtireṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāstītyucyate,
SA10canprasu:1214_0: kasya idānīṃ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇāvidyamānasya khapuṣpasyeva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmādavidyamānaprakṛtikasya anyathātvānupalambhāt,
SA10canprasu:1214_1: anyathātvasya ca darśanāt, astyeva svabhāva iti / ucyate / yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātvābhāvād anyathātvasya ca darśanātprakṛtirityucyate,
SA10canprasu:1216_0: kasyedānīṃ prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasyaiva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati? tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvaṃ nāstīti sarvathā anyathātvāsaṃbhava eva /
SA10canprasu:1217_3: tadevamatyantataḥ prakṛtāvasaṃvidyamānāyāṃ sarvadharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tadanyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yo hi idānīmastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ parikalpayati,
SA10canprasu:1219_0: prasajyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ / taccaitat śāśvatocchedadarśanaṃ svargāpavargamārgāntarāyakaratvād yasmānmahānarthakaram,
SA10canprasu:1222_0: asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:1223_1: yat svabhāvena astītyucyate, svabhāvasyānapāyitvānna tat kadācidapi nāstīti,
SA10canprasu:1223_3: pūrvaṃ ca vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhāvasvarūpamabhyupetya idānīṃ tadvinaṣṭatvānnāstiti paścādabhyupagacchataḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ prasajyate /
SA10canprasu:1224_0: nanu ca bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo nāstītyabhyupagacchato mā bhūdbhāvadarśanābhāvācchāśvatadarśanam,
SA10canprasu:1224_3: yo hi pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamabhyupetya paścāt tannivṛttimālambate,
SA10canprasu:1224_6: sa nāstīti bruvan kiṃcinnāstīti brūyāt pratiṣedhyābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:1224_7: viparyastānāṃ tu mithyābhiniveśanivṛttyarthamataimirikā iva vayaṃ brūmaḥ- na santi sarvabhāvāḥ iti /

SA10canprasu:1245_0: uttarasmin kṣaṇe utpanne pūrvaḥ saṃsaratīti cet,
SA10canprasu:1245_4: kiṃ ca ekatve sati pūrvottarakṣaṇavācyataiva na syāt /

SA10canprasu:1245_20: kutaḥ kāryakāraṇavyavasthā pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā vā bhaviṣyati? yadā ca pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā kāryakāraṇavyavasthā ca nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1245_21: tadā saṃtāno 'pi nāsti, tadabhāvānnāsti bhavatāṃ saṃsāra iti anityānāmapi saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti saṃsāra iti /

SA10canprasu:1256_0: iha hi manuṣyopādānāddevopādānaṃ gacchan parityajya vā manuṣyopādānaṃ devopādānaṃ gacchedaparityajya vā? yadi tāvatparityajya gacchatītyucyate,

SA10canprasu:1256_2: vigato bhavo vibhavaḥ / bhavaḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ, tadrahitaḥ syāt / yaśca vibhavo 'nupādānaḥ, sa skandharahitatvāt prajñaptyupādānakāraṇarahitatvānnirhetukaḥ syāt /

SA10canprasu:1256_8: atha aparityāgena, tathāpi nopapadyate / kiṃ kāraṇam? pūrvasyāparityāgāduttarasya ca grahaṇād yasmādekasyātmano dvayātmakatā syāt /
SA10canprasu:1256_9: na caitadiṣyata iti / tasmādaparityāgenāpi saṃsaraṇaṃ nāsti /

SA10canprasu:1258_4: atha sarvātmanā, evamapi sa eva vibhavatāprasaṅga āpadyate /
SA10canprasu:1258_5: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ yadantarābhavasaṃcāre 'tisāmīpyāt sūkṣmaṃ kālamanupādānaḥ syāt /

SA10canprasu:1258_7: na hi ekasya devadattasya sarvātmanā gṛhādgṛhaṃ saṃcarataḥ ekadā tyāgopādānakriye dve saṃbhavataḥ /

SA10canprasu:1258_11: tasmād yaugapadyenāpi tyāgopādāne na saṃbhavataḥ ityaparihāra evāyam /
SA10canprasu:1258_12: tasmādantarābhavopādāne 'pi sa eva doṣaprasaṅga iti sarvathā ātmano 'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ /
SA10canprasu:1259_0: yadā ca saṃskārāṇāmātmanaśca saṃsāro nāsti, tadā nāstyeva saṃsāra iti sthitam // 3 //

SA10canprasu:1272_1: yaiśca baddhāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ traidhātukaṃ nātikramantīti vyavasthāpyate,
SA10canprasu:1272_2: tadetadrāgādikaṃ bandhanatvena parikalpyamānamudayavyayadharmiṇāṃ tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmutpādānantaradhvaṃsināṃ naṣṭānāmasattvānna saṃbhavati /

SA10canprasu:1272_6: evaṃ pūrvavadeva sattvo 'pi na badhyate nāpi mucyate,
SA10canprasu:1273_0: atrāha- yadyapi saṃskārāṇāṃ sattvasya vā bandho nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1273_3: ucyate / syādupādānam, bandhanaṃ yadi kaṃcitpadārthaṃ badhnīyāt,
SA10canprasu:1275_1: sa tāvadbhāvo na badhyate / yo hi sopādānaḥ, sa baddha eva / tasya punarapi bandhanayogaḥ kiṃ kuryāt? yaścāpi anupādānaḥ bandhanarahitaḥ,
SA10canprasu:1275_4: yaścaivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaḥ sopādāno nirupādāno vā na badhyate,

SA10canprasu:1278_0: iha bandhyavyatirekeṇa bandhanaṃ nigaḍādikaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ sat bandhyaṃ devadattaṃ badhnātīti dṛṣṭam /
SA10canprasu:1278_1: evaṃ yadi bandhyebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ pudgalādvā bandhyātpūrvaṃ rāgādikaṃ bandhanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1278_2: tena pūrvasiddhena bandhanaṃ syāt saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā /

SA10canprasu:1278_7: na ca kaṃcidapyabadhnato bandhanatvaṃ yuktamiti nāsti bandhanam/
SA10canprasu:1281_0: baddho na badhyate tāvadabaddho naiva badhyate /

SA10canprasu:1284_0: baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate /
SA10canprasu:1285_0: tatra baddhasya mokṣo na saṃbhavati baddhatvāt /
SA10canprasu:1285_1: atha baddhasya paścādupāyena mokṣa iti kṛtvā baddha eva mucyate iti syāt,
SA10canprasu:1285_2: na tarhi baddho mucyata iti vaktavyam,

SA10canprasu:1286_1: sa hi mukta eva / tasya punarapi mokṣaḥ kiṃ kuryāt /
SA10canprasu:1286_2: muktānāṃ cārhatāṃ punarapi mokṣāpekṣatvād baddhataiva syāt,

SA10canprasu:1287_4: tasmānmokṣo 'pi nāsti, tadabhāvācca bandhanamapi nāstīti siddham /

SA10canprasu:1288_8: yo hyevaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu sarvabhāveṣu pratibimbamarīcikājalālātacakrasvapnamāyendrajālasadṛśeṣu ātmātmīyasvabhāvarahiteṣu viparyāsamātrānugamāt tāmeva satkāyadṛṣṭim ahaṃ mametyahaṃkāramamakārasamudācāraparigraheṇotpādya manyate-
