SA10canprasu:1705_1: saṃbhavatu mā vā / nāsmākamayaṃ paryanuyogaḥ kiṃ tarhi tasyotpādavādinaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1705_2: tatra yaḥ utpādavādī brūyāt- dṛṣṭvā janayatīti,
SA10canprasu:1705_3: sa vaktavyaḥ- na dṛṣṭametalloke yadbījādikaṃ paśyatīti /
SA10canprasu:1705_4: tasmādayuktā eṣā kalpanā / atha adṛṣṭvā kalpayet, evamapi yatkiṃcidadṛṣṭaṃ saṃbhavati tatsarvamutpādayet,
SA10canprasu:1705_5: na cotpādayati, tasmāt na adṛṣṭvāpi janayati /
SA10canprasu:1705_6: aniṣṭāpattyā hi vayaṃ parakalpanāṃ vicārayāmaḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāragiridarīprapātaduḥkhamālāsamākulāmā tāmīva /
SA10canprasu:1705_7: buddhipūrvakartṛkaṃ ca puruṣādikāraṇino jagadabhyupagacchanto nirgranthāścaikendriyaṃ bījādikaṃ pratipannāḥ prasaṅgānna vyativartanta iti /
SA10canprasu:1706_0: kiṃ cānyat- yadi yuṣmadabhimataṃ hetoḥ phalasya ca anyonyaḍhaukanalakṣaṇaṃ saṃgamanaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1706_2: yasmāt na hi parasparāsaṃgatayorālokāndhakārayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇa yorjanyajanakabhāvo dṛṣṭa iti /
SA10canprasu:1706_4: sā ca kālatraye 'pi vicāryamāṇā na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:1708_0: atītasya tāvat phalasya atītena hetunā saha jātu kadācidapi saṃgatirnāsti,
SA10canprasu:1708_2: nāpi ajātena hetunā atītasya phalasya saṃgatirjātu vidyate,
SA10canprasu:1708_4: bhinnakālatvācca / nāpi jātena vartamānena hetunā saha atītasya phalasya saṃgatiḥ saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:1708_5: bhinnakālatvāt, naṣṭasya ca phalasya avidyamānatvādvandhyāputreṇeva devadattasyetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1709_1: yathā ca atītasya phalasya atītena anāgatavartamānena hetunā saha na kadācit saṃgatirasti,
SA10canprasu:1709_2: evaṃ vartamānasyāpi phalasya traikālikena hetunā saha nāsti saṃgatiriti tat pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1710_0: na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10canprasu:1711_0: jātasya phalasya bhinnakālatvādajātena ca atītena ca hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti /
SA10canprasu:1711_1: nāpi vartamānasya vartamānena hetunā saha saṃgatirasti,
SA10canprasu:1711_4: kiṃ hi vidyamānayoḥ parasparanirapekṣayoḥ punaḥ saṃgatyā prayojanamiti nāsti saṃgatiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1712_0: idānīmanāgatasyāpi phalasya yathā atītānāgatapratyutpannena hetunā saha saṃgamanaṃ nāsti tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1713_0: nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10canprasu:1714_1: tasya bhinnakālena vartamānena atītena ca hetunā saha nāsti saṃgamanaṃ bhinnakālatvāt /
SA10canprasu:1715_0: yadā caivaṃ sarvathā hetuphalayoḥ saṃgatirnāsti, tadā-
SA10canprasu:1715_1: asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10canprasu:1716_0: naiva hetuḥ phalaṃ janayati saṃgateravidyamānatvāt vandhyāputramivetyabhiprāyaḥ //
SA10canprasu:1717_0: athāpi syāt- satyāmeva saṃgatau hetuḥ phalaṃ janayatīti,
SA10canprasu:1718_0: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam // 15 //
SA10canprasu:1722_0: yo 'yaṃ phalasya hetuḥ phalasya janaka iṣyate,
SA10canprasu:1722_1: sa tena śūnyo vā bhavan phalamutpādayet,
SA10canprasu:1722_2: aśūnyo vā? tatra hetuḥ śūnyaḥ phalena rahitaḥ phalaṃ na janayati,
SA10canprasu:1722_3: ahetuvat phalaśūnyatvāt / phalena aśūnyo 'pi hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati,
SA10canprasu:1722_5: evaṃ tāvat phalaśūnyo vā phalāśūnyo vā hetuḥ phalaṃ na janayati /
SA10canprasu:1723_0: yaccāpi phalamutpadyate, taccāpyaśūnyaṃ vā samutpadyate, śūnyaṃ vā? tatra tāvat-
SA10canprasu:1725_1: tadevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ naivotpatsyate svabhāvasyānapāyitvācca na nirotsyate /
SA10canprasu:1725_3: na caitadiṣṭam, ityataḥ aśūnyaṃ tatphalaṃ na bhavati,
SA10canprasu:1726_0: idānīṃ śūnyamapi tatphalaṃ na saṃbhavati, anudayāvyayavattvaprasaṅgāt iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1728_2: tat kathamutpatsyate, kathaṃ vā nirotsyate? na hi svabhāvena avidyamānasya ākāśādeḥ udayavyayau dṛṣṭau /
SA10canprasu:1729_0: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10canprasu:1729_2: vyatirikto vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate ityāha-
SA10canprasu:1730_0: hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
SA10canprasu:1730_1: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate // 19 //
SA10canprasu:1733_0: yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1733_3: evaṃ tāvad hetoḥ phalasya ca ekatvaṃ nāsti /
SA10canprasu:1734_0: idānīmanyatvamapi nāsti / kiṃ kāraṇam? yadi hetoḥ phalasya ca bhavanmatenābhimatamanyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1734_1: tadā paratra nirapekṣatvād hetunirapekṣameva phalaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1734_2: na caitadevam, ityataḥ anyatvamapi hetoḥ phalasya ca na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:1735_0: kiṃ cānyat- yadi hetuḥ phalaṃ janayet,
SA10canprasu:1735_1: sa tatphalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ vā janayet,
SA10canprasu:1735_2: asadbhūtaṃ vā? ubhayathā ca na yujyate ityāha-
SA10canprasu:1737_0: tatra yat phalaṃ svabhāvena sadbhūtaṃ svabhāvena vidyamānam,
SA10canprasu:1738_2: bhavatu anaikāntikatā, naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ tu siddhaṃ bhāvānām /
SA10canprasu:1738_5: sasvabhāvaśca na kaścit padārtho nāma astīti pratidvandvayabhāvāt niḥsvabhāvo 'pi padārtho nāstīti kuto 'naikāntikatā? na hi asmākaṃ pratibimbakaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ nāpi niḥsvabhāvam,
SA10canprasu:1738_7: na hi āryāḥ pratibimbakaṃ nāma kiṃcit niḥsvabhāvaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ vā upalabhanta iti /
SA10canprasu:1739_0: tatra pūrvaṃ phalaṃ notpatsyate ityādinā ślokadvayena sākṣādutpattikriyākartṛtvaṃ phalasya niṣiddham /
SA10canprasu:1740_2: na ca asati phale hetorhetutvaṃ sidhyati,
SA10canprasu:1740_4: ucyate- syāddhetuḥ, yadi ajanayato 'sya hetutvaṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1742_0: atha syāt- yadyapi evaṃ hetorhetutvaṃ nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1742_1: tathāpi phalaṃ tāvadasti / na ca hetumantareṇa phalaṃ yuktamiti phalasadbhāvād heturapi bhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:1745_0: atrāha- naiva hi kevalasya hetoḥ phalotpattikriyāyāḥ prayojakatvam,
SA10canprasu:1745_1: kiṃ tarhi hetupratyayasāmagryā phalaṃ janyate iti /
SA10canprasu:1745_2: ucyate / uktadoṣatvāt na yuktametat / api ca, iyaṃ hetupratyayasāmagrī yadi phalasya janiketi kalpyate,
SA10canprasu:1745_5: tanna yujyate / na hi alabdhātmabhāvasya prayojakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityataḥ sāmagryā avaśyaṃ labdhātmabhāvayā bhavitavyam /
SA10canprasu:1745_6: na ca labdhātmabhāvāyāḥ punaḥ svātmotpāde prayojakatvaṃ yuktam,
SA10canprasu:1745_8: yā ca ātmānaṃ notpādayati, sā kathaṃ phalamutpādayituṃ śaknotīti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1746_1: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam /23 //
SA10canprasu:1747_0: pratyayānāṃ hetūnāṃ ca yeyaṃ sāmagrī sā tāvadātmanaiva ātmānaṃ notpādayati,
SA10canprasu:1747_3: sā kathaṃ phalaṃ janayiṣyati? na hi bandhyāduhitā ātmānaṃ janayitumaśaktā satī putraṃ janayiṣyatīti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1747_4: evaṃ sāmagryapi svātmājanikā phalaṃ janayatīti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1750_0: athāpi syāt- yadi sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:1751_2: tadā kathamatyantaviruddhamasāmagrīkṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati? asāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:1752_0: atha syāt- yadyapi nāsti phalaṃ svabhāvataḥ,
SA10canprasu:1752_2: na ca phalamantareṇa hetupratyayasāmagrī saṃbhavatīti phalamapi saṃbhaviṣyatīti /
SA10canprasu:1752_3: ucyate / syāddhetupratyayasāmagrī, yadi phalameva bhavet / yadā tu yathoditena nyāyena phalameva nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1753_0: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā // 24 //
SA10canprasu:1754_0: phalābhāve sati nirhetukā hetupratyayasāmagrī api nāstītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1755_0: kaṇṭhoṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihvaparivarti ravanti akṣarāḥ /
SA10canprasu:1755_1: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaikaśa nopalabhyate //
SA10canprasu:1755_2: sāmagri pratītyataśca sā vāca manabuddhivaśena niścarī /
SA10canprasu:1755_5: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tadā dṛśī sarva vāca pratiśrutakopamā //
SA10canprasu:1757_0: iha śāsani sūramaṇīye pravrajathā gṛhiliṅga jahitvā /
SA10canprasu:1757_1: phalavantu bhaviṣyatha śreṣṭhā eṣu nideśitu kāruṇikena /
SA10canprasu:1757_3: pravrajitva gṛhiliṅga jahitvā sarvaphalasya bhaviṣyati prāptiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1757_4: puna dharmasabhāva tulitvā sarvaphalāna phalāna ca prāptiḥ //
SA10canprasu:1757_5: alabhanta phalaṃ tatha prāptiṃ āścariyaṃ puna jāyati teṣām /
SA10canprasu:1757_6: aho 'tikāruṇiko narasiṃho suṣṭupadeśita yukti jinena // iti /
SA10canprasu:1759_0: tena hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam /
SA10canprasu:1759_1: na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve na pratyekabuddhatve na samyaksaṃbuddhatve sthātavyam /
SA10canprasu:1760_0: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau sāmagrīparīkṣā nāma viṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:1762_1: saṃbhavavibhavanimittatvāt / iha kaṃcit kālaviśeṣamapekṣya aṅkurotpattiḥ bhāvānāmutpādo bhavati,
SA10canprasu:1762_3: na sarvadā, vidyamānāyāmapi hetupratyayasāmagryām- ityato vidyata eva kālaḥ,
SA10canprasu:1762_5: ucyate / syāt saṃbhavavibhavanimittatā kālasya yadi saṃbhavavibhavāveva syātām /
SA10canprasu:1763_0: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
SA10canprasu:1763_1: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai // 1 //
SA10canprasu:1764_2: vinābhāvena vā / ubhayathā ca vicāryamāṇau na saṃbhavataḥ /
SA10canprasu:1764_3: kathaṃ kṛtvā? tatra tāvad yathā vinā saṃbhavena utpādena vibhavo vināśo nāsti,
SA10canprasu:1765_0: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
SA10canprasu:1765_1: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā // 2 //
SA10canprasu:1766_0: saṃbhavaṃ vinā kathaṃ nāma vibhavo vināśo bhaviṣyati? kathaṃ nāmetyanena prasiddhamatyantāsaṃbhavaṃ darśayati /
SA10canprasu:1766_3: ko doṣaḥ syāt? ucyate / vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ syāt, ajātasya maraṇaṃ syāt / na ca ajātasya maraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti /
SA10canprasu:1767_0: evaṃ tāvadvinā saṃbhavena vibhavo na yuktaḥ iti pratipādya idānīṃ saha saṃbhavenāpi vibhavo na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1768_1: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // 3 //
SA10canprasu:1769_0: yadi hi saṃbhavena saha yugapat tulyakālaṃ vibhavaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:1769_2: na caivaṃ parasparaviruddhe ālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle vidyete iti /
SA10canprasu:1769_3: tasmāt sahāpi saṃbhavena vibhavasya nāsti siddhiriti sthitam /
SA10canprasu:1770_0: yadā caivaṃ saṃbhavena vinā vā saha vā vibhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:1770_1: evaṃ saṃbhavasyāpi vinā vā saha vā vibhavena nāsti siddhiriti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1771_0: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā
SA10canprasu:1771_1: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate // 4 //
SA10canprasu:1772_0: naiva hi saṃbhavo vibhavena vinā yujyate /
SA10canprasu:1772_1: yasmādanityatā hi bhāveṣu bhavanadharmakeṣu utpāda dharmakeṣu na kadācinna vidyate,
SA10canprasu:1773_2: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā // iti /
SA10canprasu:1774_1: tadā kutaḥ sā kācidavasthā yā vināśarahitā syāditi? ato nāsti vibhavena vinā utpāda iti /
SA10canprasu:1775_0: yastu sahetuko vināśaḥ, saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāt, utpādavat, iti sādhanamutkṣipya antyacittacaittakṣaṇairanaikāntikatāmāha,
SA10canprasu:1775_1: sa na yuktamāha, tadvināśasyāpi jātipratyayatvena sahetukatvāt sādhyasamatvācca anaikāntikatābhāvāt /
SA10canprasu:1775_2: yadapi nirdiṣṭam- bhāvātmabhāva eva abhūtvā bhāvādutpāda ucyate,
SA10canprasu:1775_4: tadapi na yuktam, adravyasatāṃ pratibimbādīnāṃ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt /
SA10canprasu:1776_0: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
SA10canprasu:1776_1: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ // iti /
SA10canprasu:1777_0: asmādā[gamāt] kuto vyavahārato dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ? yadi ca bhāvāt,
SA10canprasu:1779_0: api ca / kuto mādhyamikānāṃ svabhāvarūpaṃ siddhasattākaṃ yasya avasthāviśeṣa utpādaḥ syāt? ataḥ ayuktameva dṛṣṭāntāsiddhatodbhāvanam /
SA10canprasu:1779_2: avināśavattvāt, yathā asaṃskṛtamiti, tasyaivaṃ bruvato mahāntaṃ virodhamayaṃ heturābhavati /
SA10canprasu:1779_3: yathā hi ayaṃ heturvināśasya nirhetukatvaṃ sādhayati,
SA10canprasu:1780_0: idānīṃ vibhavena saha yathā saṃbhavasya nāsti siddhiḥ, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1781_1: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate // 5 //
SA10canprasu:1782_0: yadi hi saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva saha syāt,
SA10canprasu:1782_2: na ca [sā] saṃbhavati / tasmāt sahabhāvenāpi saṃbhavavibhavayornāsti siddhiḥ /
SA10canprasu:1783_1: atha syāt- yadyapi janmamaraṇayorekībhāvena vā nānābhāvena vā nāsti siddhiḥ,
SA10canprasu:1783_3: vācyatvāt, vijñānavat, iti / ucyate / yadi vācyatvena anayoḥ siddhiriṣyate,
SA10canprasu:1785_1: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // 6 //
SA10canprasu:1786_0: sahabhāvāsahabhāvarahitaṃ nāsti pakṣāntaraṃ yataḥ saṃbhavavibhavayoḥ siddhiḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:1786_4: anirdhāryamāṇau svarūpatvāt bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivanna staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavāviti /
SA10canprasu:1787_0: kiṃ cānyat- ihemau saṃbhavavibhavau parikalpyamānau kṣayadharmiṇo vā bhāvasya parikalpyeyātāmakṣayadharmiṇo vā? ubhayathā ca nopapadyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:1788_1: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca // 7 //
SA10canprasu:1789_0: tatra kṣayasya kṣayalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya virodhidharmasadbhāvāt saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1789_1: akṣayasyāpi bhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt kharaviṣāṇasyeva saṃbhavo na yuktaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1789_3: kṣayadharmo hi avidyamānaḥ, tasya nirāśrayo vibhavo na yuktaḥ /
SA10canprasu:1789_6: tasya avidyamānasya kuto vibhavo bhaviṣyati? yau ca saṃbhavavibhavau na kṣayadharmiṇo nākṣayadharmiṇo bhāvasya saṃbhavataḥ,
SA10canprasu:1789_7: tau na saṃbhavataḥ / iti na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau /
SA10canprasu:1790_2: sa ca tāvad bhāvo 'sti, tatsadbhāvāt tadāśritāvapi dharmau bhaviṣyataḥ iti /
SA10canprasu:1791_0: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10canprasu:1793_0: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate // 8 //
SA10canprasu:1794_1: tau ca svarūpato na staḥ iti pratiṣiddhau /
SA10canprasu:1794_3: tadā bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ ca vinā kuto bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇo bhāvo bhaviṣyati? bhāvaṃ ca vinā na staḥ saṃbhavavibhavau /
SA10canprasu:1795_0: apare tu pūrvārdhaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate /
SA10canprasu:1795_1: staḥ eva saṃbhavavibhavau, bhāvadharmatvāt / iha yannāsti, na tasyāsti bhāvadharmatvam, tadyathā maṇḍūkajaṭāśiromaṇeḥ /

SA10canprasu:2309_3: tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ / yena atyantaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā dṛṣṭāḥ,

SA10canprasu:2309_13: sa ākāśasamena cittena buddhamapi na samanupaśyati,
SA10canprasu:2309_14: dharmamapi na samanupaśyati, saṃdhamapi na samanupaśyati /

SA10canprasu:2318_3: tadā kutaḥ kleśāḥ, kuto vā skandhāḥ, yeṣāṃ nirodhe nirvāṇaṃ syāditi? tasmādvidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti /

SA10canprasu:2324_2: nāpyucchidyate skandhādivat, yaccāpi na nityamaśūnyavat, tat svabhāvato 'niruddhamanutpannaṃ ca sarvaprapañcopaśamalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇamuktam /

SA10canprasu:2499_0: kathamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya iti? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
SA10canprasu:2499_1: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2499_2: tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ? yaḥ kāyasya saṃśleṣātkaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati,
SA10canprasu:2499_5: ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ / yaḥ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoti,
SA10canprasu:2499_7: ayamucyate ākāśadhātuḥ / yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam,
SA10canprasu:2499_13: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
SA10canprasu:2499_19: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahamemiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
SA10canprasu:2499_20: atha ca punaḥ satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpatti rbhavati /
SA10canprasu:2499_21: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit /
SA10canprasu:2499_22: evamabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturnātmā [Pp_246] na sattvo na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit /
SA10canprasu:2500_0: tatra avidyā katamā? yā eṣāmevaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāyamaiksaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvapudgalamanujamānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkārasaṃjñā mamakārasaṃjñā evamādi vividhamajñānam /
SA10canprasu:2500_1: iyamucyate 'vidyeti / evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
SA10canprasu:2500_6: tāni copādāya rūpam / tacca nāma rūpam / aikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya tannāmarūpam /
SA10canprasu:2500_9: sparśānubhavo vedanā / vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāvaipulyamuipādānam / upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma bhavaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2500_17: ye cāpyanye evamādaya upakleśāste upāyāsā iti /
SA10canprasu:2501_3: āyadvārārthena ṣaḍāyatanam / sparśanārthena sparśaḥ / anubhavanārthena vedanā / paritarṣaṇārthena tṛṣṇā / upādānārthenopādānam / punarbhavārthena bhavaḥ / janmārthena jātiḥ / paripākārthena jarā / vināśārthena maraṇam / śocanārthena śokaḥ / paridevanārthena paridevaḥ kāyaparipīḍanārthena duḥkham /
SA10canprasu:2502_1: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2502_2: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2502_5: idamucyate vijñānam / vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vedanādayo 'rūpiṇaścatvāraḥ skandhāstatra tatra bhave nāmayantīti nāma /
SA10canprasu:2502_6: saharūpaskandhena ca nāma rūpaṃ ceti nāmarūpamucyate /
SA10canprasu:2502_11: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA10canprasu:2502_13: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati,
SA10canprasu:2502_15: āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūnnityamaparityāgo bhavediti yaivaṃ prārthanā idamucyate bhikṣavastṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam /
SA10canprasu:2502_17: tatra tatra prārthayate, evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca,
SA10canprasu:2503_0: evamayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nyonyahetuko 'nyonyapratyayo naivānityo naiva nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā nāvedayitā na pratītyasamutpanno nāpratītyasamutpanno na kṣayadharmo nākṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo nāvināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo nānirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat /
SA10canprasu:2504_1: atha cemānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA10canprasu:2504_2: katamāni catvāri? yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
SA10canprasu:2504_11: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:2504_12: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānasya snehakāryaṃ karomiti /
SA10canprasu:2504_13: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
SA10canprasu:2505_0: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ virohati /
SA10canprasu:2505_2: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃ kṛtoa na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2505_3: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād, ṛtusamavāyād, anyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānuviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣvamameṣvākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
SA10canprasu:2506_1: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
SA10canprasu:2506_10: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:2506_11: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:2506_12: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomiti /
SA10canprasu:2506_13: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA10canprasu:2507_3: tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate,
SA10canprasu:2507_9: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'pyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate,
SA10canprasu:2507_10: na ca tasmātsthānādūrdhvaṃ nabhasaścyutaṃ parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati asti ca candramaṇḍalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
SA10canprasu:2508_1: upādānavaikalyānna jvalati, evameva bhikṣavaḥ karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu amameṣu kṛtrimeṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
SA10canprasu:2509_1: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuvipulaphalābhinirvṛttitastatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
SA10canprasu:2509_2: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
SA10canprasu:2509_4: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2509_6: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
SA10canprasu:2509_7: ato na śāśvatataḥ / kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpyaniruddheṣu /
SA10canprasu:2509_9: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnābhāvanāmavat candrabimbapratibimbavat /
SA10canprasu:2509_10: ato nocchedataḥ / kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti /
SA10canprasu:2509_11: ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ / kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2510_0: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam /
SA10canprasu:2512_1: sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati, nāparāntaṃ pratisarati,- ityādi sūtre paṭhayate, tatra katamaḥ pūrvāntaḥ, katamo 'parāntaḥ, kathaṃ na pratisaratīti? tadvayutpatyarthamidamārabhyate /
SA10canprasu:2512_2: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya atītā ātmabhāvāḥ pūrvānta ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:2512_4: taṃ na pratisarati, dṛṣṭiprakārairnālambate / pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathā abhiniviśate /
SA10canprasu:2512_5: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2514_2: nābhūvamatītamadhvānam, abhūvaṃ ca nābhūvaṃ ca, naivābhūvaṃ na nābhūvam, iti / etāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2518_0: tatra yadyapi pūrvāntād dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayāduttaraṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ nātibhidyate,
SA10canprasu:2518_3: tatra śāśvato lokaḥ ityetat, abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityetasmānnātibhidyate / athavā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ- yacchāśvato lokaḥ ityeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrvāntamāśritā /
SA10canprasu:2518_4: abhūvamatītamadhvānam, ityeṣā tu ātmana eva pūrvāntaparāmarśena pravṛttā,
SA10canprasu:2518_5: na sāmānyeneti / evamanyāsvapi dṛṣṭiṣu viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2518_6: ityevaṃ tāvat aṣṭāvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2519_1: idānīmaparānta ucyate / tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātmabhāvāḥ aparānta ityucyate /
SA10canprasu:2519_3: taṃ na pratisarati, dṛṣṭiprakārairnālambate / pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt,
SA10canprasu:2519_5: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2521_1: catastrastvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ / tadyathā- kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānam,
SA10canprasu:2521_2: na bhaviṣyāmi, bhaviṣyāmi ca na bhaviṣyāmi ca,
SA10canprasu:2521_3: naiva [Pp_250] bhaviṣyāmi na ca na bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānam,
SA10canprasu:2521_5: kimetā eva catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ? netyāha /
SA10canprasu:2521_6: kiṃ tarhi aparā api catasro vidyante antādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ /
SA10canprasu:2521_7: tatra antādyāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena aparāntamāaśritya pravṛttāḥ,
SA10canprasu:2521_8: kiṃ tu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānamityetāstu ātmana evāparāntamāśritya pravṛttāḥ,
SA10canprasu:2522_0: tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrvāntālambikasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya yathā na saṃbhavaḥ,
SA10canprasu:2523_1: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam // 3 //
SA10canprasu:2524_0: tatra ya eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva,
SA10canprasu:2524_1: yadi sa evāyamadhunā syāt, tadā yuktamasya grahītum- abhūvamahamatītamadhvānamiti /
SA10canprasu:2524_5: iha hi pūrvaṃ yadi narakādigatiko bhūtvā idānīṃ karmavaicitryāt manuṣyeṣu upapannaḥ evaṃkalpayet- ahamevāsau nāraka āsam iti,
SA10canprasu:2524_6: tadasya na yuktam / kathaṃ hi nāma manuṣyaḥ san nārakādikaḥ syāt?
SA10canprasu:2525_0: yattarhi idaṃ paṭhayate sūtre- ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena māndhātā nāma rājā cakravartī abhūvam iti,
SA10canprasu:2525_1: tat kathaṃ veditavyamiti? anyatvapratiṣedhaparaṃ tadvacanaṃ naikatvapratipādakamiti vijñeyam /
SA10canprasu:2525_2: ata eva hi nānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayeneti paṭhayate /
SA10canprasu:2525_3: yadi punaḥ sa evāyamiti pūrvakasya cādhunātanasya ca ekatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2525_4: ko doṣaḥ syāt? uktastāvadatra doṣaḥ- nityatvaṃ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:2528_0: yadi sa eva pūrvaka ātmāyamidānīṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2528_1: tadā upādānasya pañcaskandhalakṣaṇasya viśeṣo na syāt upādāturaviśeṣātpūrvāvasthāyāmiva /
SA10canprasu:2528_3: kiṃ tarhi viśiṣyata eva upādānamupādātuḥ karmabhedāt kārakabhedācca /
SA10canprasu:2528_4: tataśca upādānaviśeṣāt sa evāyamātmeti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2529_1: ātmā tu eka eveti / ataḥ ātmano 'viśiṣṭatvādabhūmatītamadhvānamityetad bhaviṣyatyeva /
SA10canprasu:2531_0: yadi hi anyadupādānam, anyaścātmā syāt, tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmano 'viśeṣāt syādetadevam /
SA10canprasu:2531_1: na caitad bhedena darśayituṃ śakyam- ayamasāvātmā,
SA10canprasu:2531_3: pṛthaggrahaṇaprasaṅgācca / yadā caivamupādānavinirmukta ātmā darśayituṃ na śakyate,
SA10canprasu:2531_4: tadā upādānaviśeṣe 'pi ātmāviśeṣa iti na śakyate kalpayitum /
SA10canprasu:2532_2: kimupādānameva ātmatvena parikalpyate iti? etadapi na yuktamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2534_0: yathā tāvadupādānamevātmā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2536_2: na caivamātmā pratikṣaṇamutpadyate ca vinaśyati ca /
SA10canprasu:2536_3: ātmā skandhebhyastattvānyatvādinā ca nityānityatvenāpyaśakya eva vaktum,
SA10canprasu:2536_4: anekadoṣaprasaṅgāt / nityatve hi ātmanaḥ śāśvatavādaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2539_5: na caitad dṛṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2542_1: kiṃ tarhi upādānavyatirikta eva ātmā bhaviṣyati /
SA10canprasu:2543_1: gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate // 7 //
SA10canprasu:2544_2: ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ / na caivaṃ gṛhyate / tasmādupādānavyatirikto 'pi nāsti /
SA10canprasu:2547_0: atha syāt- yadi ātmā upādānasvarūpo na bhavati,
SA10canprasu:2547_2: udayavyayaprasaṅgācca / sa hi anyo 'pi na bhavati upādānamanapekṣya bhedena grahaṇaprasaṅgāt /
SA10canprasu:2549_1: sa kathaṃ nāstīti syāt? na hi avidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ skandhānupādāya prajñapyate /
SA10canprasu:2549_2: kathaṃ sati upādāne upādātā nāstīti yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2549_6: ihāpi ca pūrvameva sthānasthāneṣu kṛtā vyavastheti na punariha tadvayavasthāne yatna āsthīyate /
SA10canprasu:2550_1: idānīṃ nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityedapi yathā nopapadyate tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2551_1: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam // 9 //
SA10canprasu:2552_0: yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya adhunātanasya ātmano 'nyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2553_0: yadi punaḥ pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt, ko doṣa iti? ucyate-
SA10canprasu:2554_0: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:2554_1: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ // 10 //
SA10canprasu:2555_0: yadi hi ayamadhunātana ātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anyaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2555_1: tadā taṃ pūrvakamātmānaṃ pratyākhyāya parityajya tannirapekṣaḥ ataddhetuka eva syāt /
SA10canprasu:2555_2: kiṃ cānyat / tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra yadi pūrvakādātmanaḥ asya anyatvaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2555_3: tadā anyatvād ghaṭotpāde paṭāvināśavat pūrvasyātmanā uttarasminnapi ātmani samutpadyamāne 'pi anirodhaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2555_6: tenaiva prakāreṇa tathaiva sa tatrāvatiṣṭheta tathaivāvatiṣṭheteti /
SA10canprasu:2557_0: yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet / iti,
SA10canprasu:2558_2: ko doṣaḥ syāt? tatra doṣā bahavaḥ syuḥ /
SA10canprasu:2560_2: iha ca anyasyaiva cotpādanātpūrvakasyātmana ucchedaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2560_5: atha pūrvakenātmanā kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ uttareṇātmanā phalaparibhogaḥ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:2560_6: tathāpi anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalasya anyenopabhogaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2563_0: api ca / yadi ayamātmā pūrvakādātmanaḥ anya eva atropapannaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2565_0: iti / yadi hi ātmā pūrvamabhūtvā paścādutpannaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2565_1: tadā kṛtaka eva ātmā syāt / na ca kṛtaka ātmeṣyate, anityatvaprasaṅgāt / vyatiriktasya ca tanniṣpādakasya karturabhāvāt kutaḥ kṛtakatvamātmano yojyeta? kṛtake cātmani parikalpyamāne ādimān saṃsāraḥ syādeva,
SA10canprasu:2565_3: na caitadevam / tasmānna kṛtaka ātmā / api ca / saṃbhūto vāpyahetukaḥ / abhūtvā prāgātmā samutpadyamāno nirhetuka evopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:2565_4: pūrvaṃ hi ātmā nāstīti akṛtako nirhetukaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2565_5: vāśabdo vikalpe / kṛtako vā bhavedātmā yadi vā nābhūvamatītamadhvānamityetannābhyupeyam /
SA10canprasu:2570_0: evaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena abhūmatītamadhvānamiti yā dṛṣṭiḥ,
SA10canprasu:2570_2: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmād dvayaṃ hyetatsamāhatamubhayamiti kalpyate /
SA10canprasu:2570_3: ekaikasya ca pṛthakpṛthagabhāvāt kutastatsamāhāra iti ubhayamapi na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:2570_4: [Pp_254] ubhayasyābhāvāt kutastatpratiṣedhena nobhayaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? tasmānnaivābhūvaṃ na nābhūvamityetadapi nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:2571_0: tadevaṃ pūrvāntaṃ samāśritasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya asaṃbhavamudbhāvya idānīmaparāntasamāśritasya pratiṣedhamāha-
SA10canprasu:2574_1: aiṣyajanmani yo bhāvo sa eva na bhavatyayam //
SA10canprasu:2575_0: ityevamādinā sarvaṃ samaṃ yojyamekatvapratiṣedhe / evamanyatvapratiṣedhe 'pi samaṃ yojyam-
SA10canprasu:2576_1: aiṣya janmani yo bhāvo tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam //
SA10canprasu:2579_0: sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:2579_1: anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam // 15 //
SA10canprasu:2580_0: iha hi kaścinmanuṣyagatisthaḥ kuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā devagatiṃ gacchati /
SA10canprasu:2580_1: tatra yadi sa eva devaḥ sa eva manuṣya iti evamubhayoraikyaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2580_2: tadā śāśvataṃ syāt / na caitadevaṃ yadeva eva manuṣyo bhavediti /
SA10canprasu:2580_3: ato nāsti kiṃcicchāśvatam / api ca / śāśvatavāde sati asamutpannaśca devaḥ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2580_4: kiṃ kāraṇam? yasmājjāyate na hi śāśvatam /
SA10canprasu:2581_0: idānīmaśāśvatamapi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2583_0: yadi hi anyo devo 'nyaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2583_1: tadā pūrvakasya manuṣyātmanastatra naṣṭatvādiha ca anyasyaivotpādāt sa pūrvako manuṣyātmā tatra vinaṣṭa ityaśāśvataṃ syāt /
SA10canprasu:2585_1: tadā yathā nimbasya na āmratarusaṃtāno bhavati,
SA10canprasu:2585_2: evaṃ manuṣyasya devaḥ ekasaṃtānapatito na syāt /
SA10canprasu:2585_6: asti ceyaṃ saṃtānānuvṛttiḥ devasya manuṣyaḥ ekasaṃtānapatita iti /
SA10canprasu:2585_7: tasmāt saṃtānābhāvaprasaṅgāt devādanyo manuṣyo na bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2587_1: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavettacca na yujyate // 17 //
SA10canprasu:2587_2: yadi ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ aṃśena manuṣyatāṃ vijahyāt,
SA10canprasu:2587_6: etacca ayuktaṃ yadekasya divyagatisaṃgṛhītaḥ ekadeśaḥ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2587_7: ekadeśaśca manuṣyaḥ syāt / tasmācchāśvataṃ ca aśāśvataṃ ca etadubhayaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:2590_5: tadā kutastatpratiṣedhena naivaśāśvataṃ nāśāśvatam syāditi? tasmādetadapyayuktam /
SA10canprasu:2591_0: atha syāt- anādijanmamaraṇaparaṃparāpravṛttamavicchinnakamaṃ saṃsāraprabandhamupalabhya śāśvata mātmānaṃ parikalpayāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2591_2: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti /
SA10canprasu:2592_1: yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ // 19 //
SA10canprasu:2593_0: yadi hi saṃskārāṇāmātmano va kutaścidgatyantarād gamanaṃ gatyantaramāgamanaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2593_1: tataśca gantyantarāt punaḥ kvacid gamanaṃ syāt,
SA10canprasu:2593_5: na cāpi itaḥ punaḥ kasyacit kvacid gamanaṃ saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:2593_7: yadā caivaṃ na saṃbhavati, tadā kuto janmamaraṇaparaṃparāyā atidīrghatvena ādyanupalambhādanādimān saṃsāraḥ syāt? saṃsarturabhāvāt kutaḥ anādimattvamādimatvaṃ vā saṃsārasya saṃbhavet? yadā ca na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:2593_9: yo hi nāma evamanādimati saṃsāre paribhramannadyāpyupalabhyate iti,
SA10canprasu:2596_0: yadā caivaṃ śāśvata eva padārtho na saṃbhavati,
SA10canprasu:2596_2: śāśvatāśāśvatānupalambhācca kutaḥ ubhayaṃ kuto nobhayamiti? tasmādevaṃ śāśvatādidṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ pūrvānte saṃsārasya na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:2597_0: idānīmantānantādicatuṣṭayamaparānte yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2598_0: antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10canprasu:2599_0: yadi hi antavān, vināśādūrdhvaṃ pūrvaloko na syāt,
SA10canprasu:2599_1: tadā paraloko na syāt asti ca paraloka iti antavāṃlloka iti nopapadyate /
SA10canprasu:2599_2: athāpi anantavāṃllokaḥ syāt, tadānīmapi paralokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet? naiva paralokaḥ syādityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2599_3: na ca paraloko nāsti / ataḥ paralokasadbhāvādantavānapi loko na bhavati /
SA10canprasu:2600_0: idānīmantavattvamanantavatvaṃ ca ubhayametallokasya yathā na saṃbhavati, tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2607_0: atha yadi pūrvakāḥ skandhā na naśyeṣuḥ,
SA10canprasu:2607_1: tān pratītya uttare phalabhūtāḥ skandhā notpadyeran tadā ananto 'vināśī lokaḥ syāt svarūpādapracyutatvāt /
SA10canprasu:2607_2: yadā tu pūrvakāḥ skandhā nirudhyante taddhetukāścāpare skandhā uttarakālaṃ jāyante,
SA10canprasu:2610_5: ekadeśo na naśyatīti / ataḥ antavāṃśca anantavāṃśca loka iti na yujyate /
SA10canprasu:2611_0: kasmāt punarekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2612_1: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate // 26 //
SA10canprasu:2613_0: iha ekadeśasya vināśe ekadeśasya cāvasthāne parikalpyamāne yadi vā upādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ avasthānaṃ vā parikalpyeta,
SA10canprasu:2613_1: yadi vā upādānasya? tatra yadi tāvadupādāturekadeśasya vināśaḥ ekadeśasya cāvasthānaṃ parikalpyate,
SA10canprasu:2615_0: naiva hi atra kācidupapattirasti yayā ekadeśasya vināśamekadeśasya cāvināśaṃ parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2617_0: athavā / upādātā hi nāma ātmā / sa ca skandheṣu pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇo na saṃbhavati /
SA10canprasu:2617_1: yaśca na saṃbhavati, tasya kathamekadeśo vinaṅkṣyate,
SA10canprasu:2617_2: ekadeśaśca na naṅkṣyate? ata evāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti /
SA10canprasu:2617_3: athavā yadi upādāturekadeśo naśyedekadeśaśca na naśyet,
SA10canprasu:2617_5: na caitadiṣyate ityāha- evaṃ caitanna yujyate iti /
SA10canprasu:2618_0: idānīmupādānasyāpi yathā na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2621_0: tadevamubhayadarśanāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ yathā nobhayamapi na saṃbhavati tathā pratipādayannāha-
SA10canprasu:2623_1: ataḥ antavattve ca anantavattve ca ubhayasminnapratīte kasya pratiṣedhena naivāntavān nānantavān lokaḥ iti dṛṣṭisaṃbhavaḥ syāditi /
SA10canprasu:2624_0: evaṃ tāvat sāṃvṛtaṃ pratibimbākāramupādātāramupādānaṃ cābhyupetyāpi śāśvatādidṛṣṭayasaṃbhavaṃ pratipādya idānīṃ sarvathā bhāvasvabhāvānupalambhena bandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivat śāśvatādidṛṣṭīnāmasaṃbhavaṃ pratipipādayiṣurāha-
SA10canprasu:2626_0: iha sarvabhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt śūnyatvaṃ sakalena śāstreṇa pratipāditam /
SA10canprasu:2626_1: tataśca sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt katamāstāḥ sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ śāśvatādyā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyanti,
SA10canprasu:2626_2: yāḥ kaścid grahīṣyati yatastannirākaraṇamārapsyāmahe? tathā kiṃ vā ālambanaṃ yat sarvabhāvānantargataṃ yatraitā dṛṣṭaya utpatsyante yatraitā dṛṣṭīrnivārayiṣyāmaḥ? katamaścāsau bhāvaḥ pudgalo vā sarvabhāvabāhyāḥ yasyaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ utpatsyante yaṃ dṛṣṭibhyo nivārayiṣyāmaḥ? kiṃ vā dṛṣṭīnāmutpattikāraṇamālambananimittaṃ sarvabhāvabāhyaṃ yasmānnimittādutpadyamānāḥ śāśvatādikāḥ dṛṣṭīḥ vārayiṣyāmaḥ? sarveṣāmeva hi padārthānāṃ sarvabhāvāntargatatvāt śūnyatvam,
SA10canprasu:2626_3: śūnyatvācca sarve eva hi te padārthā nopalabhyanta iti,
SA10canprasu:2628_0: naiva kāścit, naiva kvacit, naiva kasyacit, nāpi kenacidākāreṇa saṃbhaviṣyantītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2628_1: asaṃbhave ca sati āsāṃ parikalpanaiva notpadyate ityayuktā evaitā dṛṣṭayaḥ /
SA10canprasu:2633_0: prapañcopaśamaṃ śivaṃ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñayā hi deśitavān sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇārthaṃ jagatāmanukampāmupādāya mahākaruṇāmevāśritya priyaikaputrādhikatarapremapātrasakalatribhuvanajanaḥ na lābhasatkārapratyupakārādilipsayā,
SA10canprasu:2635_0: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanāvaraṇaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati asatastucchataḥ riktato 'sārato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ,
SA10canprasu:2635_6: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani,
SA10canprasu:2635_10: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati kiṃ nvidaṃ kathaṃ nvidaṃ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ ayaṃ sattvaḥ kutaṃ āgataḥ,
SA10canprasu:2635_11: sa itaścyutaḥ kutra gamiṣyatīti yānyekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthagloke dṛṣṭigatāni bhaviṣyanti tadyathā- ātmavādapratisaṃyuktāni jīvavādapratisaṃyuktāni kautukamaṅgalapratisaṃyuktāni,
SA10canprasu:2635_12: tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi /
SA10canprasu:2636_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ,
SA10canprasu:2637_0: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dṛṣṭiparīkṣā nāma saptaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam /
